Soo Te Pabe'e yise gi haa'no umu kwinga'atoo mease meatzedose mee nanesootuha'e,
“E Naa, soo tubetse suda nuka tu yugwekwuna nu-tamme kemmana nu gi oo nasoomanekena. Ka ume nuka tunetammapu nu oo mayohokwu.”
O'no yise sumu'yoo soo Te Naa tummatziwabe soo toha kasa-ga'yoo oo-baa tabua petuse ka Te Pabe'e besakoosoo sootuhidooa.
Togesoo ka pumme tu yugwekwuna oo soonammetugupunne soo oo nanekoonana ka teepu-koobatoo puupe pasawedu-kwa'ne manewunu.
Soo Te Pabe'e ka nanesootuhimakwuse yotsese ka umu pumme nakatzimodu-baa petuhooga ka suda sokwamana mu utua'e mu mayu petuse,
mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa gi utu'ipana. Yosuhoose nanesootuhigonno, o'no mu ka Sutakoo mumme nemooaga mu gi oo-ma nakatzabe-wa'ne'yoo.”
Ka Te Pabe'e togesoo yadooawunu soo nana Judas mee naneadu mu tukwutumadu-no ewow numu oo-baa moohe petu. Oosoo ka Te Pabe'e-baa petuse oo mitzadya'me. O'no umu oo sopedakwatoohoo.
Pana soo Te Pabe'e yise meeoo o netamma, “Judas how u suda e matugukwuse sapa e mitzadya'me?”
Mu Te Pabe'e-no tunakatzimodu ka tukwutumadu poonnese meeoo ka Te Pabe'e tubenga, “Tamme haa'a umu-no nagoekwu?”
Sumu'yoo mu Te Pabe'e nakatzimodu yise sumuoo mu Jew pabe'e tummatziwabe naka tseka'akwunihoo.
Soo Te Pabe'e yise meeoo oo netamma, “Mow sapa.” Ka meeoo oo netammase ka nana naka pukwikoo oo nakwuga'ahoo-kooba matuguse soo oo naka besa mani.
Soo Te Pabe'e yise ka mu Jew pabe'e tukwutumadu meeoo netamma, “Nu gi suda tumatugudu, gi naduyadu, gi tuduhadu tuwazoo. Gi sakwa mu koodoo'oo-ma e tumahepana, wobe-ma, tsegesa-ma tuwazoo.
Tooe mu ka e nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo sapa gi nu-ma tzakadupu-ga'yoo. Muusoo too'e. Mooasoo soo tubope ebeoo nabotuku o'nosoo Te Naa tamme tuukwe-kwa'nesoo.
Mu tukwutumadu yise ka Te Pabe'e-ma tzakaduse oo bika ka mu Jew-numu tutunehanedu naa-matoo. Soo Peter kwinga'a mu-nakwi meadabe.
Ka mu numu yise ka tunehane nobe-kobenakoo pedahoose soo Peter yise ka mu numu-naga katu.
Sumu'yoo tseadumu yise ka Peter poonnese ka oo tsetsoogase yise meeoo unakwe, “Esoo nana ka Jesus-matu.”
Pana soo Peter yise meeoo unakwe, “Nu gi ma-notu.”
Ka mu numu togesoo aata'a, kumma'yoosoo numu ka Peter poonnese punno'o meeoosoo, “U punno'o umu-notu.” Pana soo Peter yise meeoo ka nana netamma, “Nu gi.”
Togesoo mu tuutooe kumma'yoosoo numu punno'o ka Peter meeoo netamma. “U tubetse yow ka Jesus nakatzimodu-matu. U Galilee-witu.”
Soo Peter meeoo mu netamma, “Nu gi mu numu nemooaga, nu gi umu-notu.” Togesoo ka Peter ookow nemayuyakwe soo tsekana kwu'a yagakooha.
Soo Te Pabe'e yise ka Peter poonnega'a. Soo Peter yise oo soomayuhoo ka Te Pabe'e pumme netammapu. “Gisoo ka tsekana yaka pahe tooe u gi e nanenama'yoodooa.”
Soo Peter pumme unnepu soomayuse yagakooha.
Mu tutukwutumadu ka Te Pabe'e nasootzamekuna oo pooe wutumase yise oo wupageta.
Yise meeoo oo tubenga, “U too'e no'okosoo gi hemma watzekudu, haga meno'o u wupageta?”
Mu ewa'yoo tutukwutumadu ha'yoo tooe oo netammana oo-ma'yoona naneko'e.
Ka tu tabuakese mu tutukwutumadu ka Te Pabe'e mu tunehanedu-koobenatoo hane petuga yise mu tutunehanedu meeoo oo tubenga.
“U haa'a yow soo nanetammadu Ne Pabe'e?” Soo Te Pabe'e mu nanekwegea, “Tooe mu mumme e tuukwe sapa gi mu e oedyuku-wa'ne'yoo.
<range>
Saa'a mu e poonnekwu Te Naa toogoopatu-kumaba e katu numme mu tunemadabuekukwu.”
Mu tutunehanedu yise meeoo oo tubenga, “U haa'a Te Naa Tooa?” Te Pabe'e yise meeoo, “Aha, nu yow soo Te Naa Tooa'a.”
“Oosoo ka meeoo naneyugwena puusoo gi toge-tamme kemmowgena,” mee mu tutunehanedu nana'unakwe.
Mu numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabe'e tzakunana ka tibo'o numu nehanedu Pilate mee naneadu-kobena oo bi petuga.
Umu ka Te Pabe'e nemooyugwena ka Pilate mee netamma, “Numme eka nana mayu esoo ewa ka mu numu suda neyugwe. Gi ka mu Roman numu-kooba katudu ka mu tumasumudooyina hemepana, mee mu netamma, ‘Nu yow Mu Pabe'e ka mu Jew numu-kooba katukwudu,’ mee unakwe.”
Soo Pilate yise ka Te Pabe'e tubenga, “U haa'a mu Jew numu-kooba katukwudu?” Soo Te Pabe'e meeoo, “Aha, o umesoo unnena.”
Soo Pilate yise ka mu Jew numu tutunehanedu no'oko meeoo netamma, “Nu ka ma-no yadooase, yise esoo ka oo manepunne e tuukwe mu unnena tubetse oo ata'yoosoo. Esoo nana gi suda manakwe.”
Pana mu tutunehanedu ooosapa mee unnegonno, “Esoo ka mu numu suda neyugwewunu, mana ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-toogoo suda tuneyugwedu.”
Soo Pilate ka meeoo mu unnegonno mu nakase mee mu tubenga, “Oosoo haa'a Galilee-wi'yoona kemmapu?”
Umu mee oo nanekwegea, “Aha.” Soo Galilee numu-kooba katudu Herod mee naneadu punno'o Jerusalem-wi. Soo Pilate yise ka Te Pabe'e ka Herod-matoo nemawuni. Soo Te Pabe'e yise ka Herod pukwi'yoo-kwitoo tzakaka.
Soo Herod besa soonamme ka Te Pabe'e puu-baa natzaka petugase. “Soo Jesus sumuna umu besa tu tumadipu-matu e tzapoonnekukwu. Wuna'me nu oetu nakakena besa oo poonne soonamme,” mee soo Herod soonammekatu.
Ewa ka Te Pabe'e tubenga pana soo Te Pabe'e gi oo nanekwegea.
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu osoo konnopunnena no'obasoo nanasuda oo netammagonno.
Soo Herod yise ka umu tutukwutumadu-no ka Te Pabe'e suda matuguna oo-ma'yoona nanekoena oo nasootzamekugonno. Umu unu nanenagadu-kwi oo kwaseakute mu Jew numu-kooba katudu mee oo netammana yise ka Pilate-matoosoo oo taya.
Wuna'me mu ka Pilate-no Herod gi natoke'yookute pana ka yoo hemma manepetuse umu napua'ahoo.
Ka Te Pabe'e-baa punowse petugase soo Pilate ka mu Jew numu tutunehanedu nesumuhoo.
Yise mee mu netamma, “Mu ekow nana nu-baa bi petu. Esoo nana ka mu numu suda neyugwe gi ka numme-kooba katudu nakabetsea mu mee'e e tuukwena. Nu oetu soohanese masoo gi ka mu unnekwasoo manakwe.
Nu tuwazoo ka Herod-matoo a too'e taya. Soo Herod punno'o gi how a yugwe ka gi how a manakwe.
Masoo sakwa sukwe nuupageta yise natzama'wu mee nu mesoo unakwe.”
No'yoona mu numu ewa unnegonno, “Ka Barabbas ne tzama'wukuse ka Jesus batsa.”
<range>
Soo Barabbas nakwutuma oosoo ka mu wakwawa'a tamme-kooba aatadu wohonekese numu goese ooetoo nakwutumadu. Soo mu wakwawa'a tumatuguna ka tabeba oe maneyakwe sumuoo nakwutumadu natzama'wuyakwe mu numu oo netutzeayina.
Soo Pilate ka Te Pabe'e too'e netzama'wusoo pana
mu numu ewa unnegonno, “Oo tzakwenne, oo batsa.”
Soo Pilate mee mu numu tubenga, “How manena mu ooka e batsa tuungu? Oosoo gi suda tumatugu. Nu oo wupagetase oo tzama'wukwu.”
Pana mu numu papabatsesoo mee nana'unnegonno, “Oo batsa.” Soo Pilate yise mu nakabetsea.
Soo Pilate yise ka mu tutukwutumadu ka Te Pabe'e batsa tuungu ka mu numu meeoo unakwe.
Soo Pilate yise ka Barabbas tzama'wu tooe mu wakwawa'a numu-kooba aatadu oo wohonekese numu oo goese sapa.
Sumu'yoo nana Simon mee naneadu ka Cyrene mee naneadu-wi'yoona kemmadu ka Jerusalem-witoo kemmadape. Mu tutukwutumadu Te Pabe'e tzemahudu oo wegeagena. Oo-ma tzakaduse ka Te Pabe'e puma nataposakwuna oo tokwu tuungu ka Te Pabe'e-nakwisoo.
Ewa'yoo momoko'ne mu-nakwisoo punno'o meadape sakwina.
Soo Te Pabe'e umu-tamme nakwumunase ka mu momoko'ne mee netamma, “Mu sakwa gi nu-koobatoo sagwipana. Mu sakwa muusoo yise ka mu doodooamu-koobatoo sakwi.
Pudusoo Jerusalem-witu suda namanekwu mu doodooamu-makoo suda namanatzayakwe mu yise mee unakwe, ‘Mu numu gi doodooamu-ga'yoo tookwa besa namanatzi.’
Umu yise ka giba-matoo nanesootuhikoo mee unnena, ‘U sakwa numme-koobatoo aanooakase mee wumabema.’ ” Pana soo giba gi oo manakwe.
Togesoo e gwetzoi sapa umu suda e yugwe tooe gi suda e manakwe sapa. Umu ka saa'a e batsase umu mumme numu Jerusalem-witu unu suda yugwekwu mu ka suda tumatuguse.”
Mu waha'yoo tuduhadu punno'o ka Te Pabe'e-no natzakase nataposa.
Mu tutukwutumadu yise ka Numu Tzonoho mee naneadu-kwi petugase ka sunngabe nuummadabue-ma oo taposa wahoo tutuduhadu naana naamookwi.
Soo Te Pabe'e mee nanesootuhikooha, “E Naa u sakwa mu numu yaa manepunnedu ma'emukwana soomu'wa, umu gi oo nakasopedakwadoona yoo e yugwe.” Mu tutukwutumadu yise ka oo kwasu natotsakwate.
Mu numu oona konnona Te Pabe'e tupoonnepunne mu Jew numu tutunehanedu oo-ma'yoona naneko'e. Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabe'e mee netamma, “U puu kukumma'akoosoo magwetzoi mee unnepana meno'o sakwa yise u uusoo namagwetzoi u ka Te Pabe'e mee nane'yugwena.”
Mu tutukwutumadu punno'o ka Te Pabe'e-ma'yoona naneko'ena. Umu yise ka suda kammadu baa suda manena ka Te Pabe'e too'e mapoonneku pana oosoo
yise gi oo hepe. Umu mee oo netamma, “U sakwa uusoo namagwetzoi, u ka pooha-gana mu Jew numu-kooba katudu mee naneyugwena.”
Ka Te Pabe'e tzopa ka sunngabe-ma soo wobe nataposa mee oo-ma natubo'o, “Yow soo Jew numu-kooba katudu.”
Sumu'yoo mu tutuduhadu-matu ka Te Pabe'e-kumaba nataposadu mee oo netamma, “U ne Pabe'e mee naneyugwepana gi hownnekoo te magwetzoa'e.”
Soo sumu'yoo tutuhadu punno'o ka Te Pabe'e-ma'yoona sooiwunudu mee netamma, “Gi meeoo unnepana. U sakwa ka Te Naa-wi tunaka'oedyuku ta punno'o nagoekwu.
Ta ka tuma'emukwase sakwa oe tumanaga pana esoo nana puu gi tuma'emukwa.”
Oosoosoo tuduhadu yise ka Te Pabe'e mee netamma, “Ka u pooha-toohakwi kodyu petuse, saa'a e sootuhi.”
Soo Te Pabe'e mee oo netamma, “U sakwa oo nakasopedakwatoo yaa tabeno soo Te Naa ta sootuhikwu ka pu-baa ta pepetugase.”
Tabeno manakwana oona ka taba pahe-kwitoo oo katu-kwikoo tooe, no'oko teepu-koobakwitu toganopunne.
Soo taba koomeba-ma natzadoboyahoo. Soo wunapu ka Te Naa pooha pukwi'yoona mu pooha maneyina naamootoo natzakwenedu pa'anakwana tubongo oo naamootoo natzagebu'ehoo.
Soo Te Pabe'e ka Te Naa mee nanetzakwiya'e, “E Naa meno'o u-matoo e moogooa meahookwu.” Yise soo Te Pabe'e ya'ehoo.
Soo tueya'edu pabe'e ka a namanina poonnese mee unakwe, “Esoo nana tookwa togesapa besa'yoo.”
Ewa'yoo numu ka Te Pabe'e ya'ehoose oo poonne suda sokwamana ka suda oo matuguse yise nobe-kwitoo kodyu mee nana'unnena, “Tamme suda manakwe, tamme tuma'emukwa.”
Umu Te Pabe'e soobedyadu umu momoko'ne Galilee-wi'yoona ka Te Pabe'e-no kemmapu oona kwinga'yoona oo poonne ka suda oo nuugwe.
Sumu'yoo nana Joseph mee nane'a ka mu Jew numu tutunehanedu-matu, besa'yoo nana, kaaheno tumatugudu.
Soo Joseph gi ka Jew numu tunehanedu nakabetzape ka Te Pabe'e mu nebatsa. Soo Joseph ka Te Naa tu nakabetseana sookwina.
Soo Joseph ka Pilate-baa petugase ka Te Pabe'e tookoo oo natuungu.
Soo Joseph ka oo tookoo hanehoose wunapu-wi oo mabutooe. Gisoo ka taba egea, ka tupe-naga natudotawaga gisoo numu pukwi nanomatuguna, ooweoo soo Joseph ka Te Pabe'e tookoo nanomatugu.
Esoo ka nanesootuhi tabeno-kobenasoo namanena.
Umu momoko'ne ka Te Pabe'e-no Galilee-wi'yoona kemma'adu ka Joseph nagegase ka Te Pabe'e nanomatuguna poonne.
Umu nobe-kwitoo kodyukase nakwana'a matabue oo tookoo-kooba nahanekwudu. Umu ka Jew tumayohope mayohona gi kodyu ka nanesootuhi tabeno oo manese.
Ookow mooo'a awamooasoo tu pudutabuagena mu momoko'ne Te Pabe'e tookoo pukwi nanomatugupu-wi petugonnohoo ka nakwana'a tu tumadabuepu hanena.
Soo tseketadyadu tupe oo-kobena nahanepu puma oo namatumana namagonnonooekwunipu-ga'yoo.
Umu oe tzoonooahookase sapa gi ka Te Pabe'e tookoo oekoo ma'yu.
“Hano soo Te Pabe'e tookoo?” mee umu nananetammadyakwe. Waha'yoo toha kakasa-ga'yoo umu-baa tapua petu besa patakwetseadu-kwi nanamasooana.
Mu momoko'ne umu-ma nasoosuahoo.
Mu toha kakasa-ga'yoo mee mu momoko'ne netamma, “Mu sakwa gi suipana. Gi ka togesoo nummenummedu numu ka numu tuipu-nagatu watepana. Te Pabe'e gwetzoi.
Mu sakwa oo soomayu ka gisoo nabatsana oosoo mu tuukwe, ‘Pudusoo mu suta'yoo numu e batsakwu yise waha tabe mease nu namayodakwusoo.’ ”
Mu momoko'ne yise ka Te Pabe'e unnepu sooma'yu,
ka oo nanomatugupu-wi'yoona mea'ase ka Te Pabe'e nakatzimodu no'oko tuukwe.
<range>
Mu Te Pabe'e nanayadooawabe gi ka pumme mu tuukwepu naka'oedyukute sukwe meeoo tooe unakwe mee mu soobedyana.
Soo Peter yotseoose ka Te Pabe'e uga nanomatugu-kwitoo tanomanegea. Ka oe petuoogase, oetu tomooe'ma pukwi oo namasooapu suu'mu oe kwakwape oosoo yise nobe-kwitoosoo mea mee soonamme, “Mu momoko'ne tookwa togesapa tuukwe ha'oogena yise mani?”
O'no tabenosoo waha'yoo nanana Te Pabe'e-wi tunaka'oedyukudu Emmaus mee naneadu-witoo memea kwinga nasogomea ka Jerusalem-wi'yoona.
Umu ka memeadabena ka namani-kwitu nanatugwe'nga.
Te Pabe'e mu hatsuhookase sapa
umu gi oo posopedakwadoo.
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee mu tubenga, “Hekwitu mu netammana?” Umu ka suda sokwamana wamepetu.
Sumu'yoo umu-matu Cleopas mee naneadu mee oo netamma, “U suu'mu ka sumuna ka umu Jerusalem-witu-matu gi ka a namane-kwitu naka.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise oo tubenga, “Ha'oo tu namanise?” Umu yise meeoo, “Jesus-witu, oosoo unu pooha-ga'yoo ka Nazareth-witu kemmana. Ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-ma soo Jesus unu pooha-ga'yoo oosoo ka ewow numu mabesakuse yise Te Naa besa unnepu numu tuukwepu.
‘Soo Jesus tookwa Te Pabe'e. Oosoo ka mu Tibo'o tayakwuni,’ mee numme ooosapa sokwamadu. Pana umu tutunehanedu ka mu Tibo'o ooka batsa tuunguna. Etze'e tabe mea ka oo tu namanise.
<range>
Yaa awamooa mu momoko'ne numme-matu besow ne tuukwe gi ne nakasopedakwadoona. Umu meeoo, ‘Awamooasoo numme mea'a ka pukwi Te Pabe'e nanomatugu-kwitoo,
pana Te Pabe'e kadoo'yoo. Numme ne tuusoobedya-kwikoo umu Te Naa tummatzidu mu toha kakasa-gakoo poonne umu mee ne tuukwe'e, “Te Pabe'e gwetzoi.” ’
Mu numme-nagatu-matu mu naana ka oo nanomatugu-kwitoo mea'a. Umu oo poonne petuga oosoo ka mu momoko'ne umu tuukwe-kwa'nesoo. Pana umu gi Te Pabe'e poonne.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee mu netamma, “Mu gisoo e nakasopedakwadoo. Mu gisoo oo naka'oedyukute ka o'nosoo Te Naa yadooawabe tamme tuukwena.
O'nosoo umu meeoo tubotugu, ‘Soo Te Pabe'e mooe nabatsase saa'a yise no'oko mu numu nemadabuekwu.’ ”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise besasoo mu tuukwe'e ka o'nosoo Te Naa nanayadooawabe Te Pabe'e-witu mu numu tuukwekepu. Mooe'ugasoo soo Te Pabe'e ka Moses unnepu mu tuukwe'e penakwa yise umu susumudu Te Naa nanayadooawabe unnepu waha.
Umu yise ka umu waahoo naana pukwitoo mea tzage'e manepetu. Pana soo Te Pabe'e oo-kwingadusoo meadu.
Umu yise meeoo oo netamma, “Mooasoo yongoho pudusoo taba egeahookwu, u sakwa numme-baasoo tooi.”
Ka mu tukakwuse, soo Te Pabe'e ka tukaba gwuuhoose oetu mu nanesootuhikukooha. Ka tunemamakwuse oo tzabokase umu-matoo oo mameaku.
O'no umu o posopedakwatoo oosoo yise gi tapu'aka.
Umu yise mee u'unekwate, “Ka te sogo kemmadape, soo Te Pabe'e ka a nabotuguna besasoo ta tuukwe, ta yise besa oo nakasoobedya.” Umu yise yosuhoose ka Jerusalem-witoosoo kokodyuhooka, okow yongonasoo.
Ka mu pepetugase no'yoona Te Pabe'e yadooawabe nanano o, ewa'yoo numu punno'o mu-kumisoo.
Umu ka mu waahoo mee netamma, “Soo Te Pabe'e togesapa tu ya'e-kwikoo namayodu, Simon Peter ka Te Pabe'e poonne.”
Umu waha'yoo yise mee mu netamma, “Soo Te Pabe'e numme-no sogomea. Ka o'nosoo Te Naa nanayadooawabe tubotuguna ka Te Pabe'e-witu besasoo ne tuukwe'e. Numme ka mooe'ugasoo gi oo posopedakwatoo. Saa'a ka oo nanesootuhise ka tukaba oo tzabokase, numme oo pudu posopedakwatoo.”
Togesoo mu apegeagonno soo Te Pabe'e umu-baa tapu'a petuse mu yadoo'e.
Umu nasoosuihoo, “Uda tsoapa,” mee sokwamahoo.
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee mu netamma, “Mu sakwa gi nu-ma suipana. Gi nu tsoapa.
Nu nuusoo yow ka e mi noko e kuku pumakoo e natzepotzetapu poonne. Mu e mesoo tzama. Soo tsoapa gi tookoope-ga'yoo.”
<range>
Ka besa sokwamahoose umu gisoo oo soo'oedyukupana ka tsoapa mee oo sooyugwepunnena. Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee mu tubenga, “Mu haa'a hemma nadukadu hane?”
Umu yise pakwe nano'hona oo magahoo
oosoo yise mu-kobena'yoosoo tukakooha umu yise oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Pabe'e tookwa togesapa nummenumme.
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee mu netamma, “Mooasoo nu ka mu-baa'yoona mu tuukwe'e no'oko ka Te Naa yadooawabe tubotuguna togesapa oo-toogoo namanekwu.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise ka Te Naa nanayadooawabe tu tubotugupu nanakasoopedekwadoo oo mayugwe.
Mee mu netamma, “Mooasoo o'nosoo e manekwuna nanemamakwu. Nu nabatsase pahe tabe mease nu e ya'ekwikoo namayoda.
Soo nu-kwitu besa na'unnedu no'obatusoo numu oo natuukwekwu, mooe'ugasoo yaa Jerusalem-wi'yoona yise mana kwinga'a-kwi. Mu numu yise tu tuma'emukwana nanekwahase mu tuma'emukwana nasoomu'wase mu nasootuhikwu ka nuka naka'oedyukuna.
Mu ka nu-kwitu mu numu tuukwekwu ka e manena poonnena yise ka e unnepu nakana.
Pudusoo nu mu poohamakakwu ka Te Naa unne-kwa'ne. Mu sakwa yaa Jerusalem-wisoo ka mumme e pooha-makanano'oto.”
Saa'a yise Bethany-tamme meana soo Te Pabe'e mayodase mu nanesootuhikute.
Toesoo mu nanesootuhikuwununa umu-baa'yoona toogoopatoo tsebooega.
Umu Te Pabe'e tuukwewabe yise besa sokwamana ka Jerusalem-witoosoo kodyuka.
Umu ooosapa ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kwi'yoona nanesootuhiyakwe, “U, Ne Naa tubetse besa'yoo,” mee unneyakwe.
Gisoo ka teepu namadabue soo Te Pabe'e mooasoo o. Soo Te Pabe'e ka Te Naa-baa ka Te Naa-wa'ne'yoonasoo.
<range>
Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabe'e no'oko hemma matabue tuungu.
Soo Te Pabe'e yise ka ooosapa nummennummekwuse no'oko numu kootabuakute Tu Besa Pooha-ma.
Soo Te Pabe'e kootabuapunnena, togano-wi numu mesoo kootabuakute. Soo suta'yoo togabu-witu gi oo matzooeku-wa'ne'yoo. Soo Te Pabe'e tamme-baa petuse gi haa'noto tamme-nagakwi nummennumme. Soo Te Pabe'e ka tubetse kootabuadu ka mu numu yaa teepu-koobatu haneku petu. Soo Te Pabe'e ooosapa besa tusooyugwedu, numu besa matugu tuwazoo ka kaahenotu ooosapa tuwazoo waha. Numme ka Besa Poohabe poonne, soo Te Naa ka Tu Besaa Tooa'a ooka sootuhi. Soo nana John mee naneadu ka Te Naa tamme-tamme tutayana ka Te Pabe'e-witu mu numu oo tuukwe tuungu. Saa'a mu numu yise ka Te Pabe'e-wi tunaka'oedyukukwu. Soo John yise ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi paba yadooase mee unne, “Yow esoo nana puwitu mumme e tuukweyina.” Mu yise mee unakwe, “Tooe esoo nuga kwannga'apana esoo ka Te Tubetse Pabe'e-notu esoo ka ooosapa gwetzoinnummekwuse. Ooonne'yoona tamme sakwa yise oo nakabetsea.” Soo John gi Te Pabe'e, oosoo ka Te Pabe'e-witu numu sukwe tuukwekwu. Ka mu numu meeoo tuukwekwu soo Te Pabe'e numu magwetzoikwu. Tooe soo Te Pabe'e o'nosoo ka teepu matabuese sapa, ka tu nanumu-baa petuse, susumudu umu-matu gi oo heesoobedya. Umu ka Te Pabe'e naka'oedyukudu suu'mu, Te Naa doodooamu manepetugakwu. Gi tamme hownnekoo tammesoo namagwetzoa'e soo Te Pabe'e ka gwetzoibu te sootuhikwu. Numme ka nanabesa oo pooha manena poonne.
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
Soo Te Pabe'e no'oko hemma hee-gana, yise ewahoo nasootuhipe te sootuikwu.
O'nosoo soo Moses ka te nanamooatupu tuukwe'e, mee mu saa'a ka Te Naa-witu nakadooa. Saa'a yise soo Te Pabe'e Jesus te tuukwe soo Te Naa unu te soobedya. Soo Te Pabe'e togesapa te tuukwe.
Gi haga ka Te Naa poonnedu, oo Besaa Tooa'a Jesus suu'mu ooosapa oo-no'yoodu oo sopedakwadoo. Soo Te Pabe'e ka Te Naa witu te tunesootabue.
Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu Jerusalem-witu ka mu naana-matu yise ka mu tutummatzidu-no ka John-matoo nataya mee yise oo tubengu. “Haga u? U haa'a Te Pabe'e? U haa'a yow oosoo nanetammadu?”
Soo John mee mu nanekwegea, “Gi nu.”
“U haa'a Elijah?” mee tuwazoo umu oo tubengu. Soo John yise meeoo, “Nu gi Elijah.” Umu yise tuwazoo oo tubenga, “U haa'a Te Naa yadooawabe numme-matoo oo tutayana o'nosoo nanetammadu?” “Gi!” mee soo John.
Umu yise meeoo oo netamma, “Haga yise u? Ha'yoo saa'a numme mu numu numme tayadu tuukwedooa? U sakwa uusoo nakwitu ne tuukwe.”
Soo John mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu yow soo nana Te Naa'a Pooha-tookwi, numu-wana nobe-ga'yoo mu numu nu-baa petudyana nu meeoo mu netamma, ‘Ka suda mu tumaduguna nematzagakwuni, ka Te Pabe'e pudusoo petukwuna tugana'a tzage'e manekena ne mu numu tunesootabue.’ Ka Te Naa yadooawabe, Isaiah mee naneadu e manena nanemamakwupu-witu oo nabotugupu.”
Mu Jew nanesootuhidu-nagatu Pharisee mee nananeadu, ka mu Jew numu moohedu-nagatu-no ka John-matoo nataya. Ka baa hooodu Jordan mee naneadu-kwi soo John baa-wi numu matzakayakwe, ka Bethany mee naneadu tzage'e'yoona. Mu Pharisee meeoo ka John netamma, “U gi Elijah, u gi Te Pabe'e, u gi tuwazoo Te Naa yadooawabe-matu, how yise manena u numu baa-wi matzakayakwe? Hownnekoo pooha tooha-kwi, yise haga mu numu baa-wi u matzaka tuungu?” Soo John yise mu nanekwegea, “Nu ka mu numu, baa-wi sukwe matzaka. Soo Te Pabe'e mu-noo'yoopana mu gi oo soopedakwatoo-wa'ne'yoo.”
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
Ooga mooa soo John ka Jesus Te Pabe'e poonne, pudamme oo kemma. Soo John yise Te Naa Besa pooha-toohakwi meeoo, “Yowsoo Te Pabe'e. Yow esoo nana mu numu nanasuda mamanena-koobatoo nabatsakwudu. Soo Te Naa ka mu numu baa-wi e matzaka tuungudu mee tuwazoo e netamma, ‘U ka mu Pabe'e posopedakwadookwu, ka E Besa Pooha-ma oo pooha nasootuhise. Soo E Besa Pooha yise ooosapa ka mu Pabe'e-naga'yookwu. Soo Te Pabe'e yise saa'a ka mu tunaka'oedyukudu ka E Besa Pooha-ma punno'o sootuhikwu.’ Nu ooosapa meeoo mu netammano'o, ‘Soo Te Pabe'e pudusoo petukwu.’ Tooe oosoo e wannga'a natubanga pana yow esoo Te Tubetse Pabe'e numu-koobenatusoo. Gisoo nu Te Pabe'e posopedakwadoo, nu mu numu baa-wi matzakakena, ooonne'yoona mu Jew numu oo nakasopedakwadoo ka Te Pabe'e pudusoo petukwuna.” Soo John yise mee unakwe, “Nu ka Te Naa Besa Pooha poonne, pa'anakwana, kwe'na'a tubongo wueketu-kwa'ne tabuakese ka Te Pabe'e-naga manipetu.
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
Nu ka Pooha Nasootuhipe poonne, nu yise mu tuukwe oosoo Te Tubetse Pabe'e.”
Ookow moooa soo John waahoo umu putoohakwi natunedyooemodu-no oona konnopunne.
Ka Te Pabe'e pumoopa oo sogome'a oo poonnese, John mee mu netamma, “Mow masoo Te Pabe'e tamme-koobatoo nabatsakwudu.”
Waha'yoo umu natunedyooemodu-matu oo nakahoose, ka Te Pabe'e-nakwi memeahoo.
Soo Te Pabe'e wesase mu poonne ka tu nakwi mu memea'a. Soo Te Pabe'e yise mu tubengu, “Hemma mu?” Umu yise meehoo, “Hano u tooiyakwe?”
Soo Te Pabe'e mu nanekwegea, “Nu-no kemmase muusoo oo poonnekwu.” Umu yise, oo-no memea, oonaa oo pukwi'yoo-witoo. O'no tabeno umu gi haa'no oona oo-baa'yoopunne.
Sumu'yoo mu waha-matu natunedyooemodu Te Pabe'e-nakwi meadu, Andrew mee naneadu, Simon Peter pabe'e ka tu wanga'a-baa petuoogase oo tuukwe, “Numme ka Te Pabe'e-no nanatapoegea.”
<range>
Ka Simon yise Te Pabe'e-baa bi petuooga. Ka mu pepetuoogase soo Te Pabe'e ka Simon poonnese mee oo netamma, “U yow, Simon. Yaa mana-kwana'a nu Cephas mee ka u tubetse tunaka'oedyukute u neakwu.”
Oogow mooo'a soo Te Pabe'e ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-witoo meakwu, mee tusooyugwe. Soo Philip mee naneadu punno'o o. Soo Te Pabe'e mee ka Philip netamma, “U sakwa nu-no mea.”
Soo Nathanael mee naneadu oonow nobe-ga'yoo. Soo Philip yise ka Nathanael mayuse oo tuukwe'e, “Numme ka Te Pabe'e tapoega, soo Moses ka Te Naa yadooawabe-no o'nosoo oowetuoo botugu. Oosoo Jesus mee'e nane'a, o soo Joseph tooa'a, ka Nazareth mee naneadu-wi'yoona kemmadu.”
<range>
Soo Nathanael yise mee unakwe, “Gi besa'yoo numu suu'mu, ka Nazareth-wi'yoona kemma.” Soo Philip yise meehoo, “Kemmase uusoo nama oo tapoegea.”
Soo Te Pabe'e ka Nathanael poonne, meeoo yise, “Yow esoo Te Naa-wi tunaka'oedyukudu. Esoo gi suda tusooyugwedu.”
Nathanael yise mee tutubengu, “Hownnekoo u e sopedakwatoo?” Soo Te Pabe'e mee oo nanekwegea, “Nu oona sunnga-toohakoo u pooha poonne gisoo ka Philip ume ba'e.”
Soo Nathanael yise mee unakwe, “U yow Ne Pabe'e, u ka tamme Jew numu-kooba katukwutu.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise meeoo, “Nu u pooha poonnena mee e unakwe u haa'a e naka'oedyukute?
Nu kaaheno mu tuukwe, mu saa'a ka Te Naa nanabesa oo tumada'e oo poonnekwu. Mu nuga mane-too ka Te Naa sopedakwadoo petugakwu, o tutusooyugwena, tuwazoo.”
Waha tabe mease ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-kooba'yoona, ka Cana mee naneadu-kwi'yoona numu nanodukwadookwu. Soo Te Pabe'e ka numme tunakatzimodu-no oetu naba'e, soo Te Pabe'e pea punno'o.
<range>
Togesoo ne tuka aata soo atsa baa nasoo'ahoo. Soo Te Pabe'e pea mee oo netamma, “Soo nahebedu punoko te tukana nasoo'ahoo.”
Soo Te Pabe'e oo nanekwegea, “Gi hownnekoo nu meno'o mu tummatzi-wa'ne'yoo, e pooha manekwuna gisoo oe manepetu.”
Ooonne'yoopana soo oo pea yise ka umu numu tummatzidu mee netamma, “Ka e tooa mumme tunetammaku-kwa'nesoo, saa'a mane.”
Naapahe'yoo papabatse'yoo tupe-ma namadabuedu, pukwi baa mu tubanena umu tzage'e nahane. Mu Jew numu nanesootuhipu puma namayohona, pukwi mu mabatzagana.
Soo Te Pabe'e mee mu netamma, “Baa-ma ka pukwi mu tubanena kaanoku.” Ka ooka mu kaanokuse,
soo Te Pabe'e mee'e mu netamma, “Ka baa-matu bayoongase, ka mu tuka-kooba poena'ewabe mooe bamaga.”
Soo mu poena'ewabe ka baa-matu tumahoo, oosoo tookwa atsa baa manipu-ga'yoo. Soo mu poena'ewabe ka Te Pabe'e ooka sootunagahoona gi sopedakwatoo, umu numu tummatzidu suu'mu oo sopedakwatoo.
Soo mu poena'ewabe ka nodukwadookwudu bihoose mee oo netamma, “Tooe haga tooe ka besow atsa baa numu mooe hebekuyakwe. Yise saa'a ka mu numu baagoehookase, umu ka gi tubetse besow mu numu hebekuyakwe. U nakwitoo ka besow nabeni.”
Yow esoo nagutza mooe'ugasoo ka Te Pabe'e pooha manikepu, ka Cana-wi'yoona. Owe manakwana numme ka Te Pabe'e numme pooha tunedyooemona unukoosoo besa oo naka'oedyukute manika.
Saa'a soo Te Pabe'e ka Capernaum mee naneadu-witoo mea, tu pea, tu wanga'amu, yise numme Te Pabe'e nakatzimodu-no. Numme punno'o huu tabenosoo o.
Saa'a yise numme tunakatzimodu ka Te Pabe'e-no Jerusalem-witoo tuwazoo mea'a. Ka mu Jew numu ka o'no tu namagwetzoina soomayuna gi namayuadu tukaba nadukano'o tabeba-ga'yoo, o'no yise paba tukayakwe.
Numme pabow nanesootuhi nobe-wi petuooga, oo-kobena'yoona ka tu nananesootuhino'o mu nanana kootsoo-ma tumu'u, seepu noko weeho tuwazoo, yise susumudu nanana o manepunnena ka mu wakwawa'a puma tumukwuna tzanabetokudyakwe numme mu poonne.
Soo Te Pabe'e yise tugapoo nakweba'a-doose, ka puma mu tumuna mu kootsoo noko mu seepu tuwazoo, ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kumabakoo wumahukwunihoo. Ka pukooba mu tutzanabetokudyina tonabedahoose, ka oo-kooba natuoona tatapepu'a.
Ka mu nanana weeho-ma tumudu mee netamma, “Mu sakwa mu hootseba'a haneooka, gi ka Te Naa-matoo pukwi'yoona te nanesootuhidyina nobe-kobena'yoona hemma-ma tumupana.”
Numme ka Te Pabe'e tunakatzimodu ka saa'a oo sooma'yu ka o'nosoo Te Naa yadooawabe mesoo tubotugupu ka Te Naa unnepu, “E Naa ume ooosapa namatuguna, ka numu u-tamme suda tumaduguna nu gi petzape.”
Susumudu mu Jew numu nanesootuhi papabe'e mee oo netamma, “U sakwa besa nanasookwugi ne tusootunagaku, o'no numme u oedyukukwu yow tookwa ka Te Naa tunetammana mayoho mee numme u sooyugwekwu.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise meeoo mu nekwegea, “Mu ka eka nanesootuhi nobe kadoo mayugwese, nu pahe tabeba-wisoo oo mayodakwusoo.”
Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi papabe'e yise mee unakwe, “Esoo paba'yoo nanesootuhi nobe wu'na'me'yoosesoo namadabuepu. U yise ka sumu'yoonasoo hownnekoo u pahe tabeba-wisoo nanakwisoo a matabuehookwu?”
Pana soo Te Pabe'e puusoo tu ya'e-kwikoo tu namayoda-kwitu netammana meeoo unakwe, umu yise gi oo nakasopedakwadoo.
Ka saa'a Te Pabe'e tu ya'e-wikoo, pihoo tabeba-wisoo namayoduse, o'no numme ka oo unnepu pudu nakasopedakwadookooha, ka puusoo oo nanetammana. Numme yise oo naka'oedyukute ka Te Naa o'nosoo nanayadooawabe unnepu, yise ka Te Pabe'e unnepu togesapa nayadooadu.
Ka mu Jew numu ewa tukano'o ka Jerusalem-wi'yoona, ewa'yoo numu ka nanabesa ka Te Pabe'e pooha manena poonnese oo naka'oedyuku.
Soo Te Pabe'e mu numu waha-tamme tusooyugwedu sopedakwadoo, mooasoo mu manekwuna gi watzekupunne, soo Te Pabe'e owetuoo mu numu pumme batsakwuna soopedakwedoo. Ka sukwe numu gi totogekoo mu sopedakwadoona.
<range>
Sumu'yoo nana Nicodemus mee naneadu ka umu nananesootuhi papabe'e-matu, ka Te Pabe'e-baa toga nobene petugase mee oo netamma, “Numme numu u sopedakwatoo u yow Te Naa-nakwana kemmadu, ka tu unnepu numme u tunedyooe tuunguna. U ka Te Naa besa pooha-ma nanabesa pooha manekena.”
<range>
Soo Te Pabe'e mee oo netamma, “Nu kaaheno u tuukwekwu. Ka Te Naa nakabetsakwuse, u sakwa pudu nadooa'adoosoo.”
Soo Nicodemus yise mee ka Te Pabe'e tubenga, “Mooasoo nu unu wa'etsena. Hownnekoo nu pudu nadooa'adookwusoo? Gi nu hownnekoo ka e pea nagasoo egease pudu nadooa'adookwusoo tuwazoo.”
Soo Te Pabe'e mee oo nanekwegea, “Nu kaaheno u tuukwekwu. U ka Te Naa-wi mooe tunaka'oedyukuse, o'no yise u ka Te Naa unnepu naka'oedyukukwu. Numu puusoo oo mada'e ka numu pudu nadooa'adoona, pana soo Te Naa Besa Pooha suu'mu, ka mu numu tunaka'oedyuku mayugwekwu.
<range>
Gi a nasoomenakwupana, gi nagutza unu namanedu nu u netammakute.
Soo Te Naa ka hukwapa-wa'ne'yoo. Soo hukwapa puu tooe how tooe hukwa-tabu'a, gi tamme oo poonne-wa'ne'yoo. Gi haga pukwi'yoona oo kemmana, yise pukwitoo oo meana sopedakwadoo. Gi haga oo sopedakwadoo hownnekoo soo Te Naa Besa Pooha mu numu tunaka'oedyuku mayugwekwu.”
Nicodemus yise mee unakwe, “Togesoo nu gi oo nakasopedakwatoo ka nuka u tuukwena.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise meeoo, “U sakwa ekow nakasopedakwadoo, u ka mu Jew numu mooasoo tunedyooennummena.
Nu togesapa u tuukwekwu. Nu ka e sopedakwatoona, ka e poonnena tuwazoo, nu u tooe tuukwe pana u gi e naka'oedyukudu.
Ka yaa teepu-koobatu ka numu sooabe, Te Naa-no sumusoo manepunnedu u gi oo naka'oedyukute too'e nu u tooe tuukwepana, ka hemma manepunnena ume e tuukwe u gi oo nakasopedakwatoo, u ka gi oo naka'oedyukuna.
Gi haga yaa teepu-koobatu ka Te Naa manepunne-kwitu sopedakwadoo nu suu'mu, soo Te Pabe'e ka Te Naa ba'yoona kemmapuna oo sopedakwadoo.
Ka o'nosoo mu te nanamooatupu manepu-wa'ne'yoo, ka togogwa pumme tokuese umu ka Te Naa nanetsagwaya'e. Soo Te Naa yise meeoo mu tunetammakute, ‘Ka weehepu togogwa-wa'ne matabuese, pa'a oo taposase, umu numu saa'a ookow poonnena gwetzoimodooa.’
Mu ka nuka nanetzakwiyina gwetzoikwu. O'nosoo te nanamoomooatupu-wa'nesoo ka pa'a e nataposase mu saa'a gwetzoidooa.
Te Naa no'oko numu ka teepu-koobatu besa soobedyana, tu besa dooa tamme-koobatoo nemawuni. Tooe haga tooe nu-kwi tunaka'oedyukudu gi ya'ekwu ooosapa gwetzoinnummekwu.
Soo E Naa ka yaa teepu-koobatu numu e magwetzoi tuunguna yaatoo e ta'ya, gi nagutza ka mu sutakoo numu kadoo e mayugwe tuunguna.
Tooe haga tooe nu-wi tunaka'oedyukudu gwetzoikwu. Tooe haga tooe gi nuka heesoobedyadu sumu-tammesoo ya'ekwu, mooasoo soo Te Naa meeoo tunetammapu.
Nu yow gwetzoibu manepunnena, ooonne'yoona susumudu numu nu-ma soonammetugu, umu gi e heesoobedyadu ka suda tu manena hemma ooonakwa sooyugwena. Soo suda mu tumaduguna umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Soo tooe haga tooe suda manedu gi nuka petzape, gi tuwazoo nu-matoo kemma, oosoo ka suda tu manena soogwina ooosapa togano-kwi.
Mu numu besa tumadugudu ka tu tumaduguna gi nasookwina, nu-matoo kemma, o'no no'yoona numu mu poonne umuoo tookwa Te Naa nakabetseadu.”
Ka saa'a soo Te Pabe'e ka numme tunakatzimodu-no, ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwi petuse mu numu baa-wi matzaka.
Soo John punno'o baa-wi numu matzakadyakwe, ka ewow baa-ga-kwi'yoona.
O'no soo John gisoo nakwutumana.
Umu John pupua'amu, mu Jew nanesootuhiwabe-matu-no, ka baa-witu numu namatzakadyi-koobatoo nanepetukute.
Umu John pupua'amu ka John-matoo mease mee oo netamma, “Soo nana Te Pabe'e mee u netammana, meno'o numu baa-wi matzakadyakwe. Ewa'yoo numu oomatusoo meadape.”
Soo John yise meeoo, “Numme ka Te Naa numme tunetammekupu mayohodyakwe.”
Mu mooasoo mee e unnena naka, “Nu gi mu Pabe'e, nu oo-kobenasoo yaatoo natayadu. Nu ka Te Pabe'e-witu numu tunesootabuadu.
Ka numu nanodukwadoose, soo nana ka mogo'ne nodukwadoose oo kooma manekwu. Soo nana pua'a oo-baa sukwe wununa oo nakapunne. Oosoo punno'o besa soonamme ka nana nodukwadoodu besa soonamme. Ooonne'yoona nu besa soonamme ka mu numu Te Pabe'e-matoo mu mea, mu poonnena.
Mu numu sakwa Te Pabe'e nakatzimo gi nuka.”
Soo Te Pabe'e no'oko numu-koobatu ka Te Naa-baa'yoona kemmana, ka Te Naa manepunne-kwitu no'oko sopedakwatoo. Mu numu puu ka yaa teepu-koobatu hemma sopedakwadoona oo waha.
Soo Te Pabe'e no'oko ka Te Naa-witu sopedakwadoona te too'e tuukwe'e, pana susumudu numu gi oo naka'oedyukute.
Tooe haga tooe ka Te Pabe'e naka'oedyukuse soo Te Naa oo tubetse toge'yookute.
Soo Te Naa ka Te Pabe'e tamme-matoo tayapu, oosoo ka Te Naa kaaheno unnena te tuukwe tuunguna. Soo Te Naa too'e no'oko ka tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma Te Pabe'e sootuhi.
Soo Te Naa ka tu Tooa, Te Pabe'e Jesus, unu soobedyana too'e no'oko tu pooha oo-tamme nemawuni.
Mu numu Te Pabe'e-wi tunaka'oedyukudu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu. Mu gi Te Pabe'e-wi tunaka'oedyukuna punno'o gi gwetzoibu nasootuhikwu, yise mu tuma'emukwana umu-matoosoo kodyukwu.
Mu Jew nananesootuhidu Pharisee mee nananeadu, ka Te Pabe'e nuusookweta. Umu ka mee tunakana, ewa'yoo numu ka Te Pabe'e-wi tunaka'oedyuku manemena.
Numme Te Pabe'e-matoo natunedyooemodu, ka numu baa-wi matzakadyakwe, soo Te Pabe'e gi baa-wi numu matzakadu.
Numme ka Te Pabe'e-no ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwi'yoona mea'ase, ka Galilee mee naneadu-kwitoosoo kodyuka, soo Te Pabe'e ka mu Pharisee pumme nuusoogweda oo sopedakwadoona.
Ka oonow meana, numme ka teepu Samaria mee naneadu-toogoo me'a.
Ka Samaria-wi numme ka Sychar mee naneadu-kwi petuga.
O'nosoo ka Jacob pahoda-kwi numme petuga, ka kwinga'a sogo mease, gi nadamanese. Ka tabeno tu manekese numme ka Te Pabe'e oo tamawuse, tukapu tumuga. Soo sumu'yoo mogo'ne baa-witoo kemmana oo-baa petuoo. Soo Te Pabe'e mee oo netamma, “Nu unu puudya'e nu baa soogwa'e.”
<range>
<range>
Soo Samaritan mogo'ne mee ka Te Pabe'e netamma, “U Jew numu pana u nuka Samaritan numu banekwikute.” (Mu Jew numu ka mu Samaritan, gi petzabedu, gi unu mu yadoo'edu.)
Soo Te Pabe'e mee ka Samaritan mogo'ne netamma, “U ka e pooha-gana gi sopedakwadoona gi ka E Naa ume sootuhikwuna tuwazoo, u sakwa uga ka oo tubengase soo Te Naa sakwa ka baa puu-ma nagwetzoidu u bamaka.”
Soo mogo'ne yise mee oo netamma, “U gi tugapu-gana, gi too u wetooa-ga'yoo, soo pahodape tuwow tookapu'yoo. Hownnekoo yise u eka baa puma nagwetzoidu hanekwu?
U haa'a ka te namooatupu Jacob ooonakwa besowsoo pahodape-ga'yoo? Soo Jacob ne pahodakupu puma ookowsoo gwetzoina, umu oo doodooamu yise oo kootsoo punno'o puma gwetzoina.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee oo nanekwegea, “Tooe haga tooe ka ekow baa hebedu puudya'ekwusoo.
Pana eka nuga pumme bamakana gi puudya'e-wa'ne'yoo. Oosoo eka baa, nuga pumme bamagana nanagatoo hebese, oosoo patzona-wa'ne gi pasa-wa'ne'yoo, numu ooosapa gwetzoinnummekwu.”
Soo mogo'ne yise mee ka Te Pabe'e netamma, “U sakwa e bamaka, o'no nu gi puudya'ena gi yaatu bidya petuya'ekwu.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee oo netamma, “Ka u kooma bihoodooase yaasoo pepetuhoo.”
Soo mogo'ne mee oo netamma, “Nu gi kooma-ga'yoo.” Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee oo netamma, “U togesapa tuukwe'e, ka meeoo unnena, ‘Nu gi kooma-ga'yoo,’ mee. U manegeoo koomamu-gapu. Soo nana meno'o puno u nobe-gana gi u kooma.”
<range>
Soo mogo'ne yise mee ka Te Pabe'e netamma, “Meno'o nu u sopedakwatoo u tookwa sumu'yoo ka umu Te Naa nanayadooawabe-matu.
Umu ne nanamooatupu ekow giba-kooba'yoona nanesootuha'e, pana mu Jew yise meeoo tunetamma, ‘Tamme sakwa Jerusalem-wi'yoona nanesootuhi.’ Haga yise toge-koo?”
Soo Te Pabe'e mee oo nanekwegea, “Mu Samaritan numu nanesootuhi pana, togesoo gi oo nakasopedakwadoo. Numme ka Te Naa sopedakwatoo oosoo ka Te Pabe'e-no numme Jew-matu magwetzoipu. Mu numu tooe hano'yoona tooe nanesootuhikwu. Pudusoo mu tunaka'oedyukudu ka kaaheno Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu, ka oo besa pooha pumme tummatza'e. ‘Yooonnekoo nu-matoo mu kaaheno nanesootuhiyakwe,’ mee'e soo Te Naa te netamma. Soo Te Naa unu pooha-gana ooonne'yoona tamme tooe hano'yoona tooe sakwa ka oo pooha-masoo oo-matoo nanesootuhi.”
<range>
<range>
<range>
Soo mogo'ne yise mee oo netamma, “Nu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Pabe'e yise pudusoo petukwu. Ka saa'a petuse oosoo no'okosoo hemma kaaheno te tuukwekwu.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee oo netamma, “Nu mooasoo yow. Nu Mu Pabe'e.”
Numme ka Te Pabe'e ka mogo'ne-no yadoo'adyakwe oo poonnena umu-baa petuoogonno. Ha'ooga manena ka mogo'ne yadooedyakwe? Mee numme sookama pana gi mu tubenga.
Soo mogo'ne ka tu bano'osa mawuoogase ka tu nobe-witoo kodyuhooka. Numme ka Te Pabe'e mee netamma, “Mooasoo numme tukapu tumuhoodooa, yaatu tuka.” Soo Te Pabe'e mee ne netamma, “Nu atamasoo gwetzoidu.”
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
Numme yise mee nananetamma, “Haga gina tukapu a makahoodooa?”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee unakwe, “Nu ka E Naa tunetammana nakabetseana gwetzoa'e.
Mooasoo ewa'yoo ka Te Naa besa unnepu-witu mu numu tunedyooe. Ooonne'yoona meno'o mu numu mumme wutoo'e, ka Te Naa besa unnepu pumme tunedyooekwudu. Nu yise meeoo mu netammakwu mu numu nu-kwitu tuukwe, o'no ewa'yoo numu e naka'oedyuku manepetukwu, yise soo Te Naa gi mobegwa-ga mu sootuhikwu. Mu ka 'yoo mu manekwi nasootuhikwu. Mu yise ka mu numu ka Te Naa unnepu mooe tunedyooedu-no besa sokwamakwu ka mu numu nuka naka'oedyukuna mu nasootuha'e.”
<range>
<range>
<range>
Toge, o'no soo mogo'ne ka petuoogase ka tu nanumu mu Samaritan numu, mee netamma petuga, “Kemmase ka nana wegeadooa oosoo no'oko e manepu gi nekwatsekute. Nu oo naka'oedyukute o oosoo Te Pabe'e.” Ewa'yoo numu yise ka Te Pabe'e-wi tunaka'oedyuku mane. Mu numu yise ka Te Pabe'e-baa petuhooga.
Mu Samaritan numu yise mee ka Te Pabe'e netamma, “U sakwa yaa numme-baasoo.” Soo Te Pabe'e yise waha tabeno umu-baa.
Ka Te Pabe'e unnepu nakase ewa'yoosoo numu tunaka'oedyuku mane.
Umu ka mogo'ne mee netamma, “U ka Te Pabe'e-witu ne tuukwese numme tunaka'oedyuku mane, ka mooe'ugasoo numme ka nummesoo oo poonnese, oo nakana numme yise tubetse tunaka'oedyuku mane.”
Waha tabe mease soo Te Pabe'e ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-kwitoo mea.
Mooasoo soo Te Pabe'e ne tuukwe'e ka Te Naa nayadooawabe nananumu gi ooka mu naka'oedyukuna.
Ewa'yoo Galilee numu mooasoo ka tu pooha na'ewatuka-kwikoo ka Jerusalem-witu nanabesa ka Te Pabe'e pooha tumadugupu poonne. Ooonne'yoona ka Galilee-wi ka Te Pabe'e petugase mu numu besa oo matuku.
Soo Te Pabe'e yise ka Cana-witoosoo kodyu petu. Soo numu moohedu tooa oona ka Capernaum-witu tuoeya'e.
Soo numu moohedu ka Te Pabe'e ka teepu Galilee-wi petuna nakase, ka Te Pabe'e-baa petuse mee oo netamma, “E dooa unu tu'oedyuina ya'ega'a ona Capernaum-wi. U sakwa kemmase oo mabesakudooa.”
Soo Te Pabe'e mee oo netamma, “Mu gisoo tunaka'oedyukute. Mu ka nanabesa e pooha manepu poonnese suu'mu oo naka'oedyukukwu.”
Soo numu moohedu nana ka Te Pabe'e meeoo netamma, “U sakwa meno'osoo nu-no kemma, gisoo ka e tooa ya'e.”
Soo Te Pabe'e mee oo netamma, “U sakwa kodyuka, u tooa mooasoo gwetzoikwu.”
Soo numu moohedu ka Te Pabe'e naka'oedyukuse meahoo, togesoo ka oona tu nobe-kwitoo oo mea, soo oo tummatzidu nana oo wegeahoodooase mee oo tuukwe'e, “U tooa mooasoo besa manepu.”
Soo numu moohedu ka pumme tummatzidu nana mee tubenga, “Hannano'o besa mani?” Oosoo yise oo nanekwegea, “Etze'e toge tabeno kadoo'e.”
Soo nana oetu soomayuhoo, ka oona nokwikoo ha'yoo soo Te Pabe'e meeoo e netamma, “U tooa mooasoo besa namagwetzoipu.” Soo numu moohedu nana ka mu tu nobe-kwitu numu-no, ka Te Pabe'e naka'oedyuku mane.
Yow esoo wahasoo ka Te Pabe'e nanabesa pooha tumadugupu, ka teepu Galilee-kooba'yoona. Gi haa'no'yoose ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwi'yoona oo kodyu petuse.
Saa'a Te Pabe'e ka Jerusalem-wi petuga, ka mu Jew numu otuoo ewa pooha tuka-no'o.
Ka Jerusalem-wi oo petugase, tuutse'ekoo banunadu Bethsaida mee naneadu na'oonnakwi manegeoo nahabatoo.
Ewa'yoo tuoegoedu numu oho. Susumudu gi tutubootabuedu, umu-matu gi modu, umu-matu gi yuyutsunga manepu. Umu ka Te Naa tummatzidu toha kasa-gakoo wutooena, ka pudusoo ka baa oo mayutsunga petukwuse. Soo mooe'ugasoo numu ka baa bayutsungawunudu-kwi ekadu besa maniyakwe.
<range>
Sumu'yoo gi nummedu nana ewa (38) tomogapu oe numu-no.
Soo Te Pabe'e oo poonne ka oona oo hape, yise soo gi nummedu nana wuna'me o hape, mee oetu naka. Soo Te Pabe'e mee oo tubengu, “U haa'a u namabesakuna soogwa'e?”
Soo nana mee ka Te Pabe'e nanekwegea, “Ka bayutsungatu-kwitoo e tummatzikwudu kadoo haga. Kumma'yoosoo nonotsa nuka-kobenasoo ka baa-wi mooe ekeahooyakwe.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee oo netamma, “Yotseoose nummemanese, ka u wegea mahedase nobe-kwitoo kodyuka.”
Esoo ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi tabeno tooe, a namanena.
Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu ka nana namabesakupu mee netamma, “Soo tamme putoogoo tumayohona, gi soo numu puusoo tu wegea maheta tamme nanesootuhi tabeno.”
Oosoo nana besa manipu mee oo nanekwegea, “Soo nana e mabesakudu meeoo e netamma, ‘U besa manese, u wegea mahedase nummennumme,’ ” mee'e.
Umu numu nanesootuhi moohedu yise mee oo tubenga, “Haga meeoo u netamma?”
Soo nana gi oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Pabe'e, ka mu numu ewa-naga oo manise.
Saa'a soo Te Pabe'e ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo oo mayuse mee oo netamma, “U meno'o besa manepu. Ka suda u tumaduguna ma'wu, u ka gi suda u tumaduguna ma'wuna, soo suda u tumaduguna u-matoosoo kodyuse u unusoo tuoeyidooa.”
Soo nana yise mease ka mu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu tuukwe'e, “Soo Te Pabe'e e mabesaku.”
Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu, ka Te Pabe'e nekwohone petu, oosoo ka nanesootuhi tabeno mu numu mabesakuna.
Soo Te Pabe'e mee mu netamma, “Soo Nuga Naa, puu nonotsa tabeno numu sootuhidyakwe, gi oo ma'wudu. Nu punno'o oo-wa'ne'yoo.”
Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi moohedu, ka Te Pabe'e unu batsa soogwa'e. Soo Te Pabe'e ka nanesootuhi tabeba-wi mu numu mabesakuna, yise meeoo unakwe, “Soo Te Naa nuga tubetse Naa.” Soo Te Pabe'e ka Te Naa-wa'ne'yoosoo mee nanetammadu.
Soo Te Pabe'e mee mu netamma, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu. Nu ka E Naa tunetammana mayoho. Nu gi nugasoo manena suu'mu mayoho.
Soo E Naa ka unu e soobedyana, ka hemma how tu yugwena e tzapoonnekute. Saa'a E Naa nanabesowsoo e tzapoonnekukwu. Nu yise punno'o mumme ooka tzapoonekukwu. O'no yise mu tunaka'oedyukudu meeoo, ‘Uune! Soo Te Naa tubetse besa'yoo.’
Soo E Naa puu mu numu mu ya'ekwikoo mayodakwu, nu punno'o gwetzoibu mu numu meeoo e soobedyana sootuhikwu.
Soo E Naa gi ka mu numu saa'a nemadabuekwu, oosoo nu-tamme oo tzamunapu.
Soo E Naa no'obatusoo numu nu-tooha manekwuna soogwa'e. Tooe haga tooe nuka gi heesoobedyadu, ka E Naa tookwa gi heesoobedyadu.
Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu tooe haga tooe e unnena naka'oedyukudu, ka E Naa naka'oedyukudooa tuwazoo, umuoo ooosapa gwetzoibu nasootuhikwu. Umuoo tunaka'oedyukudu suda tumaduguna, soo Te Naa mooasoo soomu'wa, umuoo gi numu-no paba nanehanekwu, ka mooasoo Te Naa besa podo meana.
Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu. Nu-matoo nanesootuhidu, tooe tuipu pana, saa'a ka e yadooase tu tutui-kwi'yoona yosuse, ka tunaka'oedyukuna, umuoo ka ooosapa gwetzoibu gi mobegwa-gakoo nasootuhikwu.
Soo E Naa ka gwetzoibu-ma mu numu sootuhikwudu. Nu punno'o ooosoo.
Soo E Naa ka mu numu tu nemadabuekwuna nu-matoo nemawuni, ooonne'yoona nu ka mu numu nemadabuekwu, nu ka Mu Pabe'ena.
Mu sakwa ekow naka'oedyuku. Pudusoo no'yoona mu tuipu numu yosukwu, ka e nakase, ka pumme e ba'e. Soo numu besa tumadugudu, besa nasootuhikwu, ka ooosapa gi moobegwaga nagwetzoidu. Umu suda tumadugudu, punno'o soo nanasuda mu tumaduguna umuoo-matoosoo kodyukwu. Umu suda sokwamana puusoo nasootuaganekwu.
<range>
O'no nu ka E Naa nuka tunetamma-kwa'nesoo numu paba nehanekwu. Nu besa numu nehanekwu, E Naa pooha-toohakwi nu numu nehanekwu nu gi nuusu'mu numu nehanekwu.
Ka nuusoo nakwitu e nanekwaha mu gi hownnekoo e naka'oedyuku-wa'ne'yoo.
Pana soo E Naa yise nu-witu wahana, o'no yise mu sakwa oo naka'oedyukute. Nu oo sopedakwatoo ka Te Naa nanekwahana oosoo kaaheno tuukwe.
Mu mooasoo mu numu tayapu ka John nu-witu tubengakwudu. Soo John kaaheno mu tuukwepu.
Mu numu yise ka John unnena soogwa'e. Nu oo sopedakwatoo ka mooasoo togesapa tuukwena. Nu mu nemayukute ka John nu-witu wahapu, o'no yise mu punno'o e naka'oedyukuse namagwetzoikwu.
Soo John ka Te Naa Besa Po mu tzaponnekute, mu gi haa'noto besa sokwamapunne.
Soo John unnepu ka mu numu nu-witu sopedakwatoo tummatzi. Ka nanabesa e tumadipu E Naa nuka tunetammakuna, mumme e tzapoonneku o'no mu numu oo sopedakwatoo soo Te Naa yaa mu-matoo e taya.
Mu gi ka Te Naa nakana, gi tuwazoo oo poonne. Soo Te Naa nu-witu wahase, o'no yise yaatoo e taya.
Mu gi ka Te Naa unnena naka'oedyukute mu ka gi oo naka'oedyukuna mumme oo tunetammakuna.
Mu ka Te Naa unnepu nease numme namagwetzoikwu mee mu sokwamana. Pana nu-witu mu ne'a, ooonne'yoona mu sakwa e naka'oedyukuse mu namagwetzoi.
Pana mu gi nu-matoo kemma, o'no nu gi ka gwetzoibu-ma mu sootuhi-wa'ne'yoo.
Nu gi ka mu numu besa nu-witu tuukwedu wate pana
nu ka nuusoo oo sopedakwadoona, mu tookwa gi ka Te Naa besa soobedya.
Tooe soo Te Naa mu-matoo e ta'yase sapa, mu gi e naka'oedyukute. Ka kumma'akoosoo atasoo numu tunedyooe petuse, mu oo naka'oedyukute, tooe Te Naa gi ooka ta'ya sapa.
Mu ka mu numu mu besa'yoo mee mumme mu netammana besa soobedya, pana ka Te Naa meeoo unnena gi nakaheesoobedya. Mu gi hannano'o e naka'oedyuku-wa'ne'yoo.
Soo Moses mu magwetzoidu tooe mu magwetzoi mee mu tusooyugwe sapa. Ka o'nosoo soo Moses te namooatupu ka Te Naa unnepu te tuukwe'e. Soo Moses ka suda mu tumaduguna ka Te Naa tuukwekwu.
Tooe haga tooe ka Moses unnepu naka'oedyukudu nuka naka'oedyukukwu tuwazoo, soo Moses ka e manekwuna botuguse.
Mu ka gi Moses tubotuguna naka'oedyukuna, mu tookwa nuka gi naka'oedyukute.
Saa'a ka tamano tu manegese soo Te Pabe'e ka numme tunakatzimodu-no, ka banunadu Galilee mee naneadu natsemangega. Numme ka giba-matoo poyase, oona aata'a. Umu ka mu tuoegoedu oo mabesakute oo poonnese ewa'yoo numu oo nageka. Soo Te Pabe'e ka pukwi'yoona tu kemmapu-witu wesase, ewahoo numu tu nakwi kemma mu poonne.
<range>
<range>
<range>
Soo Te Pabe'e tu manekwuna sopedakwatoona, ha'yoo saa'a soo Philip unnedooa mee soonammena, ka Philip mee tubenga, “Hanoko nadukadu tamme tumuse, noko umu numu makakwu?”
<range>
Soo Philip oo nanekwegease meeoo oo netamma, “Soo nana tooe hemma tooe how yugwe, pumme tukapu puma tu tumuna suu'mu hee-ga'yoo, pana, oosoo gi toge'yoo, ka mu ewow numu makakwuse, ka tukapu ewa nanenaga.”
Sumu'yoo punno'o ka Te Pabe'e nakatzimodu-matu Andrew mee naneadu mee unakwe,
“Esoo naatse manegeoo tukaba-ga'yoo, waahoo tutukutsekoo pakwe noko. Nagutza huutse'yoo, gi tamme no'oko mu numu maka-wa'ne'yoo.”
Soo Te Pabe'e meeoo, “Ka mu numu ka pooega-kooba aata tuungu.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise ka mu manegeoo tutukutsekoo tukaba hemmahoose, ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikooha. Ka numme pumme nakatzimodu yise hemehoose, noko mu numu aatadu ne maka tuungu, ka tutugutsekoo pakwe ooosoo tuwazoo ooosoo yugwe.
Numu no'yoona togekoo yise tukahoo, ka noko numu wutzu'mese, soo Te Pabe'e numme tunakatzimodu mee netamma, “Noko ka tukapu nagupenidu masumudoo. Gi ka tukapu nahadyugwepana.”
“Numme sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) kawona kaanoku, ka tukapu nagupeni-ma, o soo manege'yoo tutukutse'yoo tukaba.”
Mu numu ka Te Pabe'e besa tumadabuehoose, oo poonnese mee nananetamma, “Yow esoo Te Pabe'e Te Naa nayadooawabe. Wuna'me tamme ka Te Naa nakawutooepunne, ka yaa teepu-koobatoo ka Te Pabe'e oo tayakwuse.”
Soo Te Pabe'e oo sopedakwadoo, ka mu numu-kooba katudu oo nemayugwekwuse, ooonne'yoona mu ma'wukase puu suu'mu oona ka giba-matoo meahoo.
Ka yongona tu manepetuse numme oo nakatzimodu ka banunadu-kwitoosoo kodyuka.
Ka tu toganokase sapa, soo Te Pabe'e gisoo numme-baa kodyu petu. Numme yise ka sake-wi kuase, ka Capernaum-witoo natsemangega.
Unu hukwa petuse, soo baa unu bayutsungakooha.
Numme banamoo-kwitoo natsemangega, o ne manikese numme ka Te Pabe'e poonne ka baa-koobakwi, oo kemmano'o ka sake tzage'e oo manikese numme sui.
Soo Te Pabe'e mee ne netamma, “Nu yow, gi suipana.”
Numme yise ka sake-wi oo netzatsebooase yabesoo ka bakumana petuga, Capernaum tzage'e.
Oogow awamooa mu numu ka banunadu oowenapa'yoona mee nananetamma, “Soo Te Pabe'e umu pumme nakatzimodu-no sumuoo sake-ga'yoo. Ka togano tamme mu poonne ka mu tunakatzimodu ka sake-wi mu mea'ase. Soo Te Pabe'e gi umu-no.”
Kukumma'yoosoo sake punno'o o ka Tiberias mee naneadu-wi'yoona kemmadu, ka oona etze'e Te Pabe'e pukwi'yoona nanesootuhina, mu numu pukwikoo oo makapu tzage'e petugadyakwe.
No'yoona mu numu oo poonne soo Te Pabe'e umu pumme nakatzimodu-no gi o, ewa'yoo numu yise ka sake-wi kuase ka Capernaum-witoo natzemangekase, ka Te Pabe'e watega. Umu ka Te Pabe'e mayuse meeoo oo tubenga, “Hannano u natsemangeke?”
<range>
Soo Te Pabe'e mu numu ewana nanekwegea, “Nu togesapa mu tuukwe. Mu numu ewana ka tseako'ena suu'mu e wategena, ka tukapu suu'mu soogwina. Gi umu ka nanabesa e pooha manena poonnese e wate.
Gi ka nasoo'awunudu paba sooyugwepana, mu sakwa ka tukapu pumme numu nakugwetzoinnummena paba sooyugwe. Soo Te Naa nuka pooha-maka. Nu ookow tukapu puma mu nakugwetzoinnummena mu sootuhikwu.” Umu numu ewana yise oo tubenga, “Hownnekoo yise numme ka Te Naa nakabetseakwu?”
<range>
Soo Te Pabe'e mu nanekwegea, “Nuka naka'oedyuku mee'e soo Te Naa unnena yaatoo e taya, o'no mu oo nakabetseakwu.”
Umu numu yise meeoo oo netamma, “Sumu tuwazoo besa u tumadina ne tzapoonneku, o'no numme u naka'oedyukukwu.
O'nosoo soo Te Naa puu umu te nanamooatupu tukaba makamena. Soo Te Naa unnepu mee nabotugu, ‘Te Naa pa'anakwana tukaba puma mu nakugwetzoinnummena mu maka, umu yise oo tuka.’ ”
Soo Te Pabe'e mee mu netamma, “Nu togesapa mu tuukwekwu, soo Moses gi ka mu nanamooatupu ka tukaba puma mu nakugwetzoinnumme maka. Pana meno'o soo Te Naa ka tukaba pummetusoo puma mu nakugwetzoinnummena-ma mu sootuha'e.
Nu yow soo tukaba Te Naa-nakwana kemmadu. Soo Te Naa ekow tukaba-ma mu sootuhikwu, nu ka Te Naa-nakwana kemmapu, puma mu namagwetzoikwuna.”
Umu numu yise mee ka Te Pabe'e netamma, “Meno'o manakwana u sakwa ooosapa 'yoonnekoo tukaba-ma ne sootuhi.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee mu netamma, “Nu yow soo tukaba mu sootuhikwudu ooosapa puma mu gwetzoimokwuna. Soo numu nuka naka'oedyukudu gi kumma'akoosoo tooe hownnekoo tukapu sookwi-wa'ne'yoo. Soo numu nuka naka'oedyukudu gi puudyi-wa'ne'yoo ka nuka nanetzakwiya'ena.
Pana mumme e tuukwe-kwa'nesoo, mu ka nanabesa e tuyugwena poonnepana mu gi e nakabetsea.
No'yoona umu Te Naa tutzeana, nuka naka'oedyukute. Nu yise gi mu tsasoopedya-wa'ne'yoo.
Nu ka Te Naa-baa'yoona kemma, nuka oo tunetammakuna mayohokwuse, gi nuusoo meeoo tusooyugwena.
Soo Te Naa ka umu pumme naka'oedyukudu tuikwuna gi petzabena. Nu saa'a ka yaa teepu-koobasoo kodyu petuse, no'oko umuoo nuka naka'oedyukudu, mu tuipu tuwazoo mayosudooa.
Soo Te Naa no'obatusoo numu nuka naka'oedyukuna, ooosapa gwetzoimokwuna soogwidu. Nu ka kodyu petuse umuoo tuipu mayosukwu.”
Umu Jew numu nanesootuhidu, yise ka Te Pabe'e nanetzamekute ka Te Pabe'e meeoo unakwe, “Nu yow ka tukapu-wa'ne'yoo numu puma nakugwetzoinnummena, Te Naa-baa'yoona kemmadu.” Umu Jew numu nanesootuhidu yise ka Te Pabe'e meeoo, “U, Ne Naa-witu esaya'e. U sukwe Jesus, ka Joseph tooa. Numme ka u naanapua'amu sopedakwatoo.”
<range>
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee mu netamma, “Gi e nanetzamekupana.
Gi mu numu puusoo e naka'oedyuku-wa'ne'yoo. Soo Te Naa mu numu sootuhidyina umu nuka suu'mu naka'oedyukudu Te Naa doodooamu manekekwu. Nu ka petuse saa'a umu nuka nagemodu, mayosukwu, tooe mu tuipu sapa.
Soo Te Naa yadooawabe o'nosoo mee tubotugu, ‘Soo Te Naa saa'a no'oko numu tunedyooedooa.’ Tooe haga tooe numu ka Te Naa unnena nakana, yise oo naka'oedyukudu, saa'a nu-matoo kemmadooa.
Gi haga ka Te Naa poonnedu, nu suu'mu ka Te Naa poonne ka oo-baa'yoona kemmapuna.
Nu togesapa mu tuukwekwu, no'yoona mu tunaka'oedyukudu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu.
Nu yow soo tukapu-wa'ne'yoo puma numu nakugwetzoinnummena, ooosapa numu puma gwetzoimokwuna.
Umu te nanamooatupu puu, ka sukwe nadukadu-ma namagwetzoimo'o, ka Te Naa pumme makana. Soo tukapu sukwe nawutzu'me, gi numu tubetse magwetzoa'e.
Nu yise yow soo puma numu tubetse gwetzoina tukapu-wa'ne'yoo, nu ka Te Naa-manakwana kemmadu. Esoo tukapu nugasoo tookoo-wa'ne'yoo, tooe haga tooe ka nuka tookoo tukase, ooosapa gi mobegwa-gakoo gwetzoimokwu. Nu ka mu-koobatoo nabatsase, o'no yise mu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu. Nu yaahoo soo tukapu numu puma nakugwetzoinnumme, nu puma mu gwetzoikwuna.”
<range>
Mu Jew numu puusoo nananepetukukooha mee nana'unnena, “Ha'oo haa'a puusoo tu tookoo-matu tzapookana te makakwu, tamme pute yise oo tukakwu?”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee mu netamma, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwe, nu yow mu Pabe'e. Tooe haga tooe nuka naka'oedyukudu ooosapa nu-no'yookwu. Nu ka tukapu numu puma nakugwetzoinnummekwuna. Soo e puupe ka baa mu hebena, puma mu namagwetzoina. Soo tooe haga tooe soogwetzoidu nu-ma suu'mu gwetzoikwu. Nu ka kodyu petuse mu tuiputoo'e saa'a namayosudooa.
<range>
Soo e tookoo tubetse tukapu-wa'ne'yoo, yise e puupe punno'o tubetse baa-wa'ne'yoo. Nu-mamma ooosapa numu gwetzoimokwu.
Tooe haga tooe ka e tookoo tukadu, yise ka e puupe hebedu ooosapa nu-no'yoopunne.
Soo Te Naa yaatoo e tayase, nu yise ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi mu-baa gwetzoinnumme. Tooe haga tooe ka e naka'oedyukuna, nu e pooha-ma mu sootuhikwu, o'no yise mu ooosapa gi mobegwa-gakoo gwetzoimokwu.
Nu yow oo soo tukapu, puma numu nakugwetzoinnummekwuna, ka Te Naa-manakwana kemmadu. Tooe haga tooe nu-no'yoopunnedu ooosapa gwetzoinnummekwu. Soo tukapu te nanamooatupu pumatu tukapu, gi haa'noto numu magwetzoidu. Pana nu yow gwetzoibu mu sootuhikwudu.”
Soo Te Pabe'e, meeoo mu numu netammadyakwe tooesoo ka nanesootuhi nobe-wi'yoona, ka Capernaum-wi'yoona.
Ewa'yoo numu ka Te Pabe'e nakapunne pana gi oo nakatugu yise mee nananetamma, “Esoo nana tamme tunedyooena unusoo namanena nanaka'oedyukukwu.”
Soo Te Pabe'e oo sopedakwatoo umu gi oo nakasopedakwadoo, ka oo unnewununa. Soo Te Pabe'e meeoo, “Mu sakwa gi nasootookepana, ka meeoo mumme e netamma.
Mu sakwa sumuna gi oo naka'oedyuku tooe e poonnepana, ka Te Naa-matoosoo e koyukase.
Mu numu gi puusoo namagwetzoi-wa'ne'yoo. Soo Te Naa-suu'mu mu magwetzoikwu. Soo nuga unnepu putoogoo ka Te Naa Besa Pooha mu naka'oedyukuna suu'mu mu sootuhikwu, o'no yise mu ooosapa gwetzoimokwu.
Pana susumudu mu-matu gi e naka'oedyukute.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee mu netamma, “Nu mooasoo mu tuukwepu, soo numu gi puusoo nama e naka'oedyuku-wa'ne'yoo. Soo E Naa mee e netamma, ‘Mumme nu-kwi tunaka'oedyuku mayugwe,’ ” mee.
Ewa'yoo numu gi oo naka'oedyukuna yise tu nonobe-witoo kodyuka.
Soo Te Pabe'e yise numme sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) pumme nakatzimodu mee tubengu, “Mu haa'a punno'o e nasoomenakwu?”
Soo Simon Peter yise ka Te Pabe'e nekwegea, “Numme ooosapa u-no'yookwudu. U ooosapa kaaheno ne tunedyooennumme. Numme ka gwetzoibu besa nakasoobedya.
Numme u naka'oedyukuna, oo nakasopedakwatoo u yow Ne Tubetse Pabe'e.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee ne netamma, “Nu mumme sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) netutzea. Pana sumu'yoo mu-nagatu ooosapa gi nu-no'yoopunne.”
Ka nana Judas Iscariot mee naneadu soo Te Pabe'e netammana meeoo. Tooe soo Judas sumumano wahamatsebooekudu (12) tunakatzimodu-nagatu pana soo Judas ka saa'a umu Te Pabe'e ooowemota mani, ka umu wohonedu-tamme mane, umuoo ka Te Pabe'e batzakwu mee tunetammana.
Saa'a soo Te Pabe'e no'oko ka teepu Galilee mee naneadu-koobakwi numu tunedyooennumme. Soo Te Pabe'e ka teepu Judea mee naneadu-kwitoo gi me'a, mu Jew moohedu oonatuoo pumme nehooawi, pumme mu nepatza.
Mu Jew numu nanesootuhi ewa tukakwuna tzage'e manegena, o'no umu numu sumuyakwe, nanasusu'mu tatza nobe-kwi nobegana, ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuha'e ewa'yoo yise nasootuhiyakwe.
Umu Te Pabe'e wanga'amu gi oo oedyukute ka tu pabe'e. Umu oo wohonena mee oo netamma, “U sakwa Judea-witoo mea. U pooha tumadipe mu tunaka'oedyukudu oetuooo tzapoonnekukwu. U ka pooha-ga'yoo mee naneyugwena, gi oo nekwatzetugupana. U ka nanabesa tumadi mee unnena u sakwa no'oko numu tzapoonneku.”
<range>
<range>
Soo Te Pabe'e mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu gi o mea-wa'ne manepunne, mu yise tooe hannano tooe mesoo mea.
Nu ka mu numu suda tumadugu mu tuukwe'e, ooonne'yoona umu yise gi e petzape, pana umu mumme gi nekwoho'ne.
Nu gi meno'o mu-no mea-wa'ne manepunne.”
Ka mu tu wanga'amu mease, soo Te Pabe'e punno'o huu tabeno ka Galilee-wisoo, saa'a puu suu'mu watze mea.
<range>
Mu Jew numu moohedu ka mu numu-naga-kwitu ka Te Pabe'e too'e wate. Ewow numu too'e tubenga, “Hano soo Jesus?”
Ka Te Pabe'e-witu ewa'yoo numu nanatuukwe. Susumudu umu-matu meeoo, “Soo Jesus besa'yoo nana,” pana susumudu punno'o meeoo, “Soo Jesus numu nemooagadu.”
Mu numu ka Te Pabe'e-no'yoopunnedu ka mu Jew numu moohedu-ma suina, ka Te Pabe'e Jesus-witu watze nanatuukwe.
Ka mu Jew numu pahe tabeno nanesootuhi ewa tuka-kwi manepetuse, soo Te Pabe'e ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kwi petuse yise nanesootuhibu-witu mu numu tuukwe'e.
Mu numu mee nanatubenga, “Hownnekoo esoo nana no'okosoo hemma sopedakwatoo? Esoo gi hannano'o nanesootuhibu-witu natunedyooepu-ga'yoo.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise meeoo, “Nu ka Te Naa unnena mu tunedyooe. Nu gi nugasoo tusooyugwena mu tunedyoo'e.
Tooe haga tooe ka E Naa nakabetseadu oo sopedakwadookwu oo naka'oedyukukwu, ka E Naa unnepu e waha.
Soo tooe haga tooe pummesoo tusooyugwena wahakwu, besa pummesoo nanemadabuewununa soogwa'epunnedu. Nu ka toge kaahenotu E Naa unnepu mu tunedyooe, o'no mu Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhikwu. Nu togesapa mu tuukwe'e, nu gi esaya'e.
Mu puu ka Moses putoogoo tumayohomeana naka'oedyukudu mee naneyugwe, pana mu puu gi oo nakabetse'a. Mu ka Moses nakabetseana, how manena mu e batsa soogwa'e?”
Mu numu mee oo netamma, “Soo tsoapa haa'a u ma'emukwa? Gi haga u batsa-soogwa'e.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee mu netamma, “Suta'yoo nana mee mu e netamma, ka nanesootuhi tabeno numu e mabesakukena.
O'nosoo soo Moses ka mu nanamooatupusoo tumayohope mu tunedyoo'e, ooona'yoona numu kootze na'oonnakwitu natsekea, umu yise Jew numu maneyakwe. Mu nanamooatupu o'nosoo ka Moses-kobenasoo gwetzoimodu, oo ka tu doodooamu mooe yugwe.
Mu puu ka Moses nakabetseana ka nanesootuhi tabeno sapa ka mu doodooamu oo yugweyakwe. Ooonne'yoona nu ka nanesootuhi tabeno sapa ka mu doodooamu oo yugweyakwe. Ooonne'yoona nu ka nanesootuhi tabeno ka nana mabesaku
mu sakwa gi e sutakupana, gi e nesootzemapana.”
Susumudu mu numu-matu mee nananetamma, “Yaa esoo nana. Mu Jew moohedu batsayagana.
Soo Jesus no'oko ne-kobena'yoona yadooadyakwe. Hownne'yoonagina mu numu moohedu a tsasoopedya? Te moohedu ka Te Pabe'e sumuna naka'oedyukute, ooonne'yoona oo tsasoopedya.”
Susumudu punno'o meeoo, “Mana numme pukwi'yoona a kemmana sopedakwadoo pana, o'nosoo soo Te Naa yadooawabe meeoo tubotugu. ‘Gi haga pukwi'yoona oo kemmana soopedakootookwu.’ Numme ka nana pukwi'yoona kemmana sopedakwatoo ooonne'yoona numme meeoo oosoo tookwa gi Te Pabe'e-matu.”
Soo Te Pabe'e ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kumaba'yoona ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-toohakwi mee mu netamma, “Mu meeoo sokwama, mu ka Te Pabe'e sopedakwatoo mee, pana mu ka pukwi'yoona oo kemmana, tuwazoo gi sopedakwadoo. Mu gi ka E Naa yaatoo nuka tayadu nakasopedakwatoo, oosoo Nuga Naa, nu oo-baa'yoona kemmahoo. Pana E Naa unnena nu kaaheno mu tuukwe'e, nu gi nugasoo unnena wahadu.”
<range>
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka Te Pabe'e sookwutuma pana gi oo-toogoo manakwe, ka gisoo ka Te Pabe'e nabatsakwi oo manakwe.
Ewa'yoo numu ka Te Pabe'e-noyoopunnedu mee nana'unakwe, “Esoo nana no'okosoo hemma nanabesa pooha mada'e, ooonne'yoona esoo nana tookwa Te Pabe'e. Soo Te Pabe'e ka petuse, oosoo no'okosoo hemma nanabesa pooha madikwu.”
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu ka mu numu unnena nakana nuusoogweda, ka mu tuukwutumadu ka Te Pabe'e wutuma tuungu, pana umu gi oo wutuma.
Soo Te Pabe'e yise ka mu numu mee netamma, “Nu gi haa'noto mu-baa'yoopunnekwu. Pudusoo nu yise saa'a ka Te Naa-matoosoo kodyukakwu.
Ooonne'yoona mu saa'a, unu e too'e soogwi pana gi e mayu-wa'ne'yoo. Mu nu-no too'e soogwedapana gi mu hownnekoo nu-noyoopunnekwu.”
Mu numu yise mee nananetamma, “Hanogina oosoo meakwuse tamme gi oo nageka-wa'ne'yoo? Oosooga sumuna ka mu Jew numu tooetoo ka mu gi Jew numu-baa manekwuse.
Hayoo unnena oosoo ka meeoo, ‘Mu e too'e soogwi pana gi e mayu-wa'ne'yoo, mu too gi e nageka-wa'ne'yoo, ka e kodyukase?’ ”
Ka mu Jew numu ewa tuka nanesootuhi tabeno namamakwuhooga'a, soo Te Pabe'e wunuse ka Te Naa Besa Pooha-punagakoo mee unakwe, “Tooe haga tooe wuna'me tu gwetzoinnummekwuna gi mobegwa-gakoo soogwidu nu-toohatoo nasoomawunise, nasootuhikwu.
Soo Te Naa unnepu mee na'unakwe oosoo, ‘Tooe haga tooe nuka naka'oedyukudu patzona-wa'ne gi pasa-wa'ne'yoo, ooosapa gi mobegwa-gakoo gwetzoibu nasootuhikwu.’ ”
Soo Te Pabe'e ka Te Naa Besa Pooha ka mu tunaka'oedyukudu saa'a tusootuhi-kwitu te tuukwekwu. Soo Te Naa gisoo ka Tu Besa Pooha-matu-ma mu numu poohamaka, ka Te Pabe'e gisoo pubaatoo kodyu petuga'a.”
Susumudu oo unnena nakase, mu numu-matu meeoo, “Oosoo tookwa Te Naa yadooawabe.”
Mu susumudu punno'o mee, “Yow tookwa Te Pabe'e.” Umu-matu yise mee unakwe, “Oosoo tookwa gi Te Pabe'e, oosoo Galilee-wi'yoona kemmadu. Soo Te Pabe'e gi Galilee-wi'yoona kemmakwudu.
Soo Te Naa unnepu meeoo, ‘Soo Te Pabe'e ka te namooatupu David ma'yoona suaketu. Oosoo ka Bethlehem mee naneadu-kwi'yoona kemmakwu, oosoo uga David pukwi'yoona kemmana.’ ”
Mu numu yise nanapokihoo nana'atasoo tusooyugwegonnona.
Mu susumudu numu ka Te Pabe'e nuusoogwetakugonno, pana gi haga yise oo wutuma.
Mu tukwutumadu yise ka mu tutunehanedu-matoo kodyuka. Mu tutunehanedu ka mu tukwutumadu mee tubenga, “How manena mu gi ka Jesus wutuma?”
Mu tukwutumadu meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Oosoo nanabesa unakwe, gi haga nana oo-wa'ne'yoo.”
Mu tutunehanedu yise mee mu tukwutumadu netamma, “Mu haa'a punno'o oo naka'oedyukute?
Numme tutunehanedu gi oo naka'oedyukute, numme mooasoo no'oko hemma sopedakwadoo, numu gi numme nemooaga-wa'ne'yoo.
Mu gi tutusopedakwatoodu gi Te Naa unnena sopedakwadoo, mu tuma'emukwana umu-tamme kodyusoo.”
Sumu'yoo umu-notu Nicodemus mee naneadu mee mu netamma,
“Oosoo meeoo nayadooa soo Te Naa unnepu, ‘Tamme sakwa ka nana-no mooe yadooase, ka ha'oo manekwuse oo sopedakwatoose, o'no tamme sumuna oo nehanese tamme oetu sopedakwadookwu, oosoo haa'a besa'yoo pute gi besa'yoo?’ ”
Umu yise mee oo nanekwegea, “U punno'o umu Galilee-witu-kwa'ne yadooa-ka'nga. U sakwa ka Te Naa unnepu nease oo nakasopedakwadoo, soo Te Naa yadooawabe gi Galilee-wi'yoona kemmakwudu.”
Ka Te Pabe'e tunemamakwuse, mu numu tu nonobe-kwitoosoo kodyudyipunne.
Soo Te Pabe'e ka giba Olive mee naneadu-matoo kodyuka, oonow tooikwu mee soonammena.
Oogow moo'a awamooasoo tu tabuagena, soo Te Pabe'e kodyuka, oona ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-kobenatoosoo. Ewa'yoo numu oo nakadu oo-baa petudyipunne. Oonow katuna nanesootuhibu mu tunedyoo'e.
Sumu'yoo mogo'ne mooasoo kooma-gapana kumma'akoosoo nana poota'ma. Mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu, ka mu Pharisee mee nananeadu-nagatu, ka mogo'ne poonnese ka Te Pabe'e-baa oo bi petuoo.
Umu Jew nananesootuhidu mee ka Te Pabe'e netamma, “Numme eka mogo'ne kumma'akoosoo nana poota'ma a mayuhoo.
Ka te tumayohope-wi soo Moses o'nosoo ka te nanamooatupu oo tuukwe-kwi, oosoo mee na'unakwe ka 'yoo manedu mogo'ne batsa. How tamme a yugwekwu?”
Umu ka Te Pabe'e too'e nekusekuna, ka gi pumme oo nanekwagea umu oo nekwohone mee sokwamana. Soo Te Pabe'e natsekwu'ne katuhoose ka tu mamoogoo-ma, ka teepu-ma tubokooha.
Mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu, ka Te Pabe'e ooosapa meeoo tubengadyakwe, “Yabe hayoo unne how sakwa tamme a ma'e?”
Umu o suu'mu tubengadyakwe, soo Te Pabe'e yise, wunuoose mee mu netamma, “Unu tooe, tupe-ma oo tapagetahoo, oo ya'e-kwitoo tooe. Pana soo gi hannano'o tuma'emukwadu sakwa oo mooe tabe.” Soo Te Pabe'e yise natsekwu'ne katusesoo ka teepu-ma tutsebokoohasoo.
Ka nasookwise mu nanesootuhibu numu tunedyooedu, ka mogo'ne meeoo netammadu, mu wakwa'etse mooe mea'a, yise mu tootooebetse umu benakwatoo punno'o mea'a. Ka mu petukwahookase,
soo Te Pabe'e wunuse ka mogo'ne meeoo tubenga, “Haga meno'o meeoo u netamma?” Soo mogo'ne meeoo ka Te Pabe'e nanekwegea, “Gi haga.”
Soo Te Pabe'e meeoo ka mogo'ne netammasoo, “Nu punno'o gi. U nobe-kwitoosoo kodyuka. Yaa manakwana gi kumma'akoosoo nana poota'ma-pana.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise ka mu numu ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kumaba manepunnedu mee netamma, “Nu ka teepu-koobatu kootabedooakute, o'no mu numu ka Te Naa besa po poonnena oo nagenokwu. Mu numu nuka naka'oedyukudu gi togaba-wi'yookwu.”
Mu Pharisee ka Te Pabe'e mee netamma, “U ka uusoo nanetammana esayidyakwe, ooonne'yoona numme yise gi u naka'oedyukute.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise meeoo, “Tooe nu nuusoo nanetamma pana, nu togesapa mu tuukwe'e. Nu ka pukwi'yoona e kemmana, yise ka pukwitoo e meakwuna mooasoo sopedakwadoo. Mu yise gi ekow nu-kwitu sopedakwatoo.”
Mu ka nuka nemadabuena gi togekoo tunemadabue, mu ka gi oo nakasopedakwadoona. Soo E Naa yaatoo nuka tayadu e tummatzikwu, nu yise kaaheno mu nemadabuekwu. Nu gi mu-kwa'ne'yoo, nu kaaheno mu tunemadabuekukwu.
<range>
Soo te tumayohope meeoo, ‘Ka waahoo numu nawa'nesoo nanekwaha oosoo togesapa.’
Numme yise ka Te Naa-no waha'yoo ooonne'yoona nu yise kaaheno mu tuukwe.”
Umu yise mee oo tubenga, “Haga yise u naa?” Soo Te Pabe'e mee mu nanekwegea, “Mu gi nu-kwitu sopedakwadoo, hownnekoosoo yise mu ka E Naa sopedakwadookwu?”
Soo Te Pabe'e meeoo mu tunedyoo'e ka pabatsekoo nanesootuhi nobe-kobena'yoona, puu-kwikoo mu numu tumasumudoo tsage'yoona. Soo Te Pabe'e gi nakwutuma, ka gisoo oo nabatsa-kwi oo manakwe.
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mu gi hemma heesoobedyadu mee netamma, “Ka pukwi'yoona e kemmapu-witoo e kodyuse, mu saa'a e tooe soogwikwu, pana mu gi e mayu-wa'ne'yoo. Suda mu tumadugu-kwisoo mu tuikwu. Mu gi nuga pukwitoo mea-kwitoo mea-wa'ne'yoo.”
Mu Te Pabe'e gi heesoobedyadu, gi oo nakasoobedakwadoodu yise meeoo nananetamma, “Ha'oo manena meeoo unakwe? Puusoo haa'a nabatsakwuse?”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee unakwe, “Mu ka sutakoo nakabetse'a, no'yoona mu numu ka teepu-koobatu moohedu punno'o ka sutakoo nakabetse'a. Pana nu ka Te Naa te pa'anakwatu nakabetse'a.
Mu ka gi nuka naka'oedyukuna, mu ka togesoo suta'yoo numuna, tuikwu.”
Umu yise oo tubenga, “How yise 'yoo u numme ata'yoosoo?” Soo Te Pabe'e yise meeoo mu netamma, “Nu ooosapa mu too'e tuukweno'o, pana mu gi e naka'oedyukute.
Nu yise ka ewasoo suda mu tumadugu-kwitu mu mesoo tuukwe-wa'ne'yoo, pana nu gi. Soo E Naa'yatoo nuka tayadu, kaaheno mu nemadunagakwu. Nu no'oko mu tooe tuukwe'e, ka Te Naa nuka tunetammakuna.”
Mu Jew numu moohedu gi oo nakasopedakwatoo, soo Te Naa ka Te Pabe'e-witu oo waha tuunguna, yaatoo oo taya.
Soo Te Pabe'e mee unakwe, “Mu saa'a e nabatsase, susumudu mu-matu oo naka'oedyukukwu, nu mu Pabe'e. O'no mu oo sopedakwadookwu, nu gi nugasoo tusooyugwena mayohokwu, pana nu ka E Naa nuka tunetammakuna mu sukwe tuukwe'e.
Soo E Naa yaatoo e tayase, ooosapa nu-no, gi e ma'wuka'a, nu ka ooosapa besa Te Naa nakabetseana.”
Ka Te Pabe'e yadooadyakwe ewa'yoo numu oo naka'oedyuku manemena.
Soo Te Pabe'e yise ka mu pudu tunaka'oedyukudu mee netamma, “Mu ka ooosapa o naka'oedyukuna nu mu doodooamu-gakoo.
Mu yise ka kaahenotu sopedakwadookwu, gi mu numu ka suta-kwitoo namoohegakwu.”
Umu yise meeoo, “Numme ka Abraham-ma'yoona suaketu. Ha'yoo u unnena meeoo unakwe tamme suta-kwitoo namoohegakwu?”
Soo Te Pabe'e mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu kaaheno mu tuukwekwu. Soo tooe haga tooe nanasuda tu manena mayohodu ka sutakoo nakabetsea.
Soo numu tummatziwabe, puu gi ka pumme nedyawedu nanumu. Pana soo numu nedyawedu dooa'a ooosapa nanumu nadatsungapunne.
Nu Mu Pabe'e, nu ooosapa mu nanumu-gakwu, mu ka e naka'oedyukuna. Nu mu sootuhise, o'no mu gi suta-kwitoo namoohegakwu.
Tooe mu Abraham-ma'yoona suakese sapa mu Te Naa dooamu mee nasokwama mu e batsa soogwa'e, mu ka gi e toge'yookuna.
Nu ka Nuga Naa nuka tuukwena mu too'e tuukwe pana, mu ka suta-nakwana suakese, ooonne'yoona mu sutakoo nakabetsea.”
Umu yise meeoo ka Te Pabe'e netamma, “Numme gi suta-nakwana suaketu, Abraham ne namooatupu.” Soo Te Pabe'e mee mu netamma, “Umu Abraham doodooamu ka Te Naa besa nakabetse'a Abraham-wa'nesoo. Mu gi Abraham doodooamu-wa'ne'yoona, gi tuwazoo Te Naa dooamu-wa'ne'yoo, ka gi Te Naa naka'oedyukuna.
Mu yise e batsa soogwa'e tooe nu kaaheno mu tooe tuukwepana mu ka Te Naa nuka netamma-kwa'nesoo, soo te namooatupu Abraham gi mu-wa'ne'yoo.
Mu ka oo manena kumma'akoosoo Naa-ga'yoo.” Umu mee ka Te Pabe'e netamma, “Numme gi kumma'akoosoo naa-ga'yoo. Numme sumuoosoo Naa-ga'yoo soo numu manumudoopu, ne tubetse Naa.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee mu netamma, “Mu ka Nuga Naa nenagana, mu sakwa unu e soobedya. Soo E Naa yaatoo e tayase, nu yise yow mu-baa petu. Gi nuusoo meeoo nasooyugwena.
Mu gi e nakabetsea. Gi ka e una'wena nakapunne.
Soo Suta'yoo, mu Naa, ooonne'yoona mu ookow nakabetse'a. Soo Suta'yoo ooosapa numu kadoo mayugwekena, ooosapa mu esaya'ekuna.
Mu ka gi togekoo naka'oedyukute, ooonne'yoo mu gi e naka'oedyukute tooe kaaheno mumme e tuukwe'e sapa.
No'yoona mu e sopedakwadoo, nu ooosapa besa tumadugudu. Nu kaaheno mu tuukwepana mu gisoo e naka'oedyukute.
Soo Te Naa doodooamu ooosapa oo nakabetse'a. Mu yise meeoo unnepana mu gi oo-no'yoopunne.”
Mu Jew numu mee oo netamma, “U gi kaaheno numme-matu, u ka mu sutakoo numu-matu-kwa'ne'yoo. U tuma'emukwadu.”
Soo Te Pabe'e mee mu netamma, “Nu gi tuma'emukwadu. Nu ka E Naa toge'yooku pana mu gi e toge'yookute, ooonne'yoona mu suda nu-kwitu waha.
Nu gi nuusoo besa naneyugwena, soo Te Naa saa'a besa nu-kwitu waha. Soo Te Naa ka umu nu-kwitu esayidu nemadunagakwu.
Nu kaaheno mu tuukwe tooe haga tooe e nakabetseadu gi ya'ekwu.”
Mu Jew numu yise meeoo ka Te Pabe'e netamma, “Meno'o numme u sopedakwatoo u tuma'emukwadu. Soo te namooatupu Abraham puu ya'e, Te Naa nanayadooawabe punno'o no'yoona tuipu. U yise meeoo, tooe haga tooe e nakabetseadu gi ya'ekwu.
U haa'a ka Te namooatupu Abraham ooonakwa besa'yoo? Hownne'yoo, mee puu u uusoo nasooyugwe?”
Soo Te Pabe'e mee mu nanekwegea, “Nu ka nuusoo nakwitu wahana, mu gi e naka'oedyukute. Pana soo nuga Naa, besow e poohamaka, ookow nuga netammana, ooonne'yoona mu numu nuka nesookwuga'e. Mu ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhidu mee nananeyugwedu.
Pana mu gi ka E Naa sopedakwatoo, nu suu'mu ka E Naa sopedakwatoo. Nu gi esa'ya'e mu-kwa'nesoo, ooonne'yoona nu sakwa oetu mu tuukwe, ka Te Naa e sopedakwadoo-kwitu.
Soo te namooatupu Abraham besa soonamme ka o'nosoo oo pooha poonnena ka yaa teepu-kooba e petukwuna.”
Mu Jew numu moohedu meeoo oo netamma, “Soo Abraham tubetse o'nosoo ya'epu. U ka Abraham gi poonnedu. O'nosoo ume gisoo nadooa'adoo.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee mu netamma, “Nu oo-koobenasoo mooasoo gwetzoi, tubetse o'nosoo gisoo ka Abraham nadooa'adoo.”
Umu yise tupe tzobakooha oo tatzagowkwu mee soogwamana. Pana soo Te Pabe'e mu manikwuna sopedakwadoo ka umu-baa'yoona yise ka pabow nanesootuhi nobe-wi'yoona watse meahoo.
Soo nana gi tubootabuena nadooa'adoopu, oona po-kumaba katu. Soo Te Pabe'e umu pumme nakatzimodu-no oona meadabena oo poonne.
Numme oo nakatzimodu ka Te Pabe'e mee tubenga, “Haga suda tumadugu-kwi esoo nana gi tubootabuena nadooa'adoopu, masoo nana haa'a puusoo suda tumaduguse, pute umu oo naanapua'amu?”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise mee ne netamma, “Esoo nana gi tubootabuedu, suda oo tumaduguna gi oo-matoosoo kodyu, oo naanapua'amu suda tumaduguna gi oo dooa'a-matoo kodyu. O'nona eka gi tubootabuedu namabesakuse mu numu oo poonnese ka Te Naa nesookwuga'e.
Tamme sakwa ka Te Naa nuka yaatoo tayadu nakabetsea. Pudusoo nu nabatsase gi mu-no'yookwu.
Nu ka yaa teepu-kooba'yoopunnena ka mu numu tummatzina, umu ka Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadookwu.”
Soo Te Pabe'e yise ka teepu-koobatoo toohese ka tu huutsenoko ka pasakwabu mayuase, ka gi tubootabuedu nana popo'a-kooba oo matzabekuhoo.
Soo Te Pabe'e yise meeoo oo netamma, “U sakwa meahoose ka patzona Siloam mee naneadu-kwi nabakomamitooa.” Soo gi tuboodabudu nana yise ka oonahoo nabakomamitooase, besa tubootabuena kodyu petuuoosoo.
Mu numu uga, ka gi tubootabue oo poonnedu mee nana'unakwe, “Yow haa'a too'e, esoo nana uga oona po-kumaba katuna numu tumasumudoo tuunguyidu?”
Susumudu numu meeoo nana'unakwe, “Aha mow oosoo nana.” Susumudu yise punno'o mee, “Gi esoo oosoo nana, oo-wa'nesoo sukwe tabuadu.” Soo nana yise mee unne, “Nu yow soo nana gi uga tubootabuedu.”
Umu yise mee oo tubenga, “How manise u tubootabue mane?”
Oosoo mee mu nanekwegea, “Sumu'yoo nana Jesus mee naneadu, pasagwabu e popo'a-kooba matzabekuse, yise ka patzona Siloam-witoo e bakomami tuungu. Nu ka bakomamitooase, besa tubootabue mani.”
Umu yise meeoo oo tubengasoo, “Hano yise oosoo nana meahoo?” Oosoo uga gi tubootabuedu nana besa manena yise meeoo, “Nu gi oo sopedakwatoo.”
Umu numu yise ka mu Jew nananesootuhidu numu Pharisee mee nananeadu-matoo ka nana bika.
Ka nanesootuhi tabeba-wi ka nana besa namabesakuse, mu Pharisee mee oo tubenga, “How manise u tubootabue mani?” Oosoo mee mu nanekwegea, “Soo Jesus tu huutsepu ka teepu noko pasagwabudoose e popo'a-kooba oo matzabekuhoose oo-koobatoo yise e bakomami tuunguse, nu yise bakomamitooase, yaatu poonne mani.”
<range>
Susumudu mu Pharisee-matu mee unakwe, “Soo Jesus tookwa gi besa'hoo pooha-gana ka te nanesootuhi tabeba-wi numu mesoo mabesakute, masoo tookwa gi ka Te Naa-nakwana kemmadu.” Susumudu mu Pharisee-matu yise mee'e punno'o unakwe, “Ekow nana mow besa oo mayugwese oosoo tookwa Te Naa besa pooha hee-ga'yoo.” Umu yise oo-koobatoo nananepetukute.
Umu yise, ka uga gi tubootabuedu nana mee tubenga, “Ha'yoo u ka nana ume mabesakudu-kwitu soobedya?” Oosoo mee mu nanekwegea, “Oosoo oo kaaheno Te Naa yadooawabe.”
Mu Pharisee gi oo naka'oedyukute, ka nana uga gi tubootabuena. Umu yise oo naanapua'amu-witoo tuta'ya.
Umu oo naanapua'amu nabi petuse, mu Pharisee mee, ka oo naanapua'amu tubenga, “Esoo haa'a mumme dooa? Yaa haa'a oosoo gi tubootabuena nadooa'adoodu? Ha'oo manese meno'o tubootabue mane?”
Mu Jew numu moohedu mooasoo mee tunetammapu, “Numme tooe haga tooe ka Jesus Te Pabe'e naka'oedyukudu ne Jew nanesootuhi nobe-kwikoo tayakwunihookwu.” Umu oo naanapua'amu ka mu Jew numu moohedu-ma suipunne, ka meeoo mu tunetamma. “Soo Jesus ne dooa mabesaku,” mee tu unnikwu-ma suipunne. Mu oo naanapua'amu mee mu nanengwegea, “Numme oo sopedakwadoo, esoo ne dooa oe manakwanasoo. Pana numme gi oo sopedakwatoo ka hownnekoo oo namabesakuse, ka ooka mabesakudu tuwazoo. Mooasoo masoo ewa tomopu, makowsoo tubenga.”
<range>
<range>
<range>
Umu numu moohedu yise ka nana uga gi tubootabuedu nabatoosoo bihoo tuwazoo. Umu yise mee oo netamma, “U sakwa ka Te Naa-matoo nanesootuhi gi ka Jesus-matoo. Numme oo sopedakwatoo soo Jesus suda tumadugu.”
Pana soo uga gi tubootabuedu meeoo mu nanekwegea, “Sumuna oosoo too'e suda tumadugudu, nu gi oo sopedakwadoo, pana nu oo sopedakwatoo, nu uga gi tubootabuedu, pana meno'o nu yaatu mesoo poonne.”
Umu yise mee oo tubenga, “Ha'oo soo Jesus u sootunagase u yaatu mesoo poonne?”
Oosoo mee mu nanekwegea, “Mooasoo nu mu tuukwe, pana mu gi e naka'oedyukute. Ha'oo manena mu ookowsoo e tubengayakwesoo? Mu haa'a punno'o ka Jesus nakatzimokwu mee sokwamana, mee sumu tutubengadyakwe?”
Umu yise ka nana nakasagwa'ekuhoo yise meeoo oo netamma, “U ka sutakoo nana naka'oedyukuna meeoo unakwe. Pana numme puu ka Moses unnepu naka'oedyukute.
Soo Moses yise uga, o'nosoo Te Naa yadooawabe. Numme ka Jesus gi Te Naa nayadooawabe mee oo unakwe sapa, gi oo naka'oedyukute.”
Soo nana yise mee mu nanekwegea, “Gi hannano'o hagaa 'yoonnekoo nana tunadooa'adoo-kwi manakwanasoo gi tubootabuedu mabesakudu. Soo Jesus ka gi tubootabuedu numu mesoo mabesakuna, oosoo kaaheno ka Te Naa ma'yoona kemmadu. Oosoo gi suta'yoo nana mee pumme netamma-wa'ne. Soo Jesus ka Te Naa nakabetseadu, ooonne'yoona oosoo ka Te Naa pooha-toohakwi numu mabesakute. Ooonne'yoona sakwa mu oo sopedakwadoo, soo Jesus, Te Naa yaatoo tutayana mee'e nu.”
<range>
<range>
<range>
Mu Pharisee ka uga gi tubootabuedu nanekwegea, “U puu ka u nadooa'adoo-kwi manakwana tubetse suta'yoo. Gi hownnekoo u ne tunedyooe-wa'ne'yoo.”
Soo Te Pabe'e ka oekoo ka nana natayakwunihoose oo naka, oo watega, soo Te Pabe'e ka oo mayuse mee oo netamma, “U haa'a ka Te Naa Tooa'a naka'oedyukute?”
Soo nana yise mee ka Te Pabe'e nanekwegea, “Aha, nu ookow naka'oedyukute. Pana nu gi oo poonnedu, haga oosoo?”
Soo Te Pabe'e Jesus yise meeoo, “Nu yow soo U Pabe'e Te Naa Tooa'a.”
Soo nana yise mee unakwe, “Nu u naka'oedyukute.” Soo nana yise Te Pabe'e-matoo nanesootuhikooha.
Soo Te Pabe'e mee unakwe, “Nu yaa teepu-kooba petu, ka umu gi Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwatoodu ka Te Naa pudu unnepu tunedyooegena, o'no saa'a umu besa oetu nakasopedakwadookwu. Susumudu mu-matu mooasoo oo nakasopedakwadoodu besa manepunne mee nasooyugwe pana, mu gi eka mumme e tunedyooena nakasopedakwadoo.”
Mu Pharisee-matu ka Te Pabe'e meeoo unakwe oo naka. Umu yise ka Te Pabe'e meeoo netamma, “Numme gi ka Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadoo, mee haa'a u unnena meeoo?”
Soo Te Pabe'e mee mu nanekwegea, “Soo numu gi oo nakasopedakwadoodu, gi mu tuma'emukwana umu-matoosoo kodyu-wa'ne'yoo. Pana mu yise ka Te Naa-witu nakasopedakwadoo mee naneyugwedu soo mumme tuma'emukwana yise mu-matoosoo kodyukwu.”
Soo Te Pabe'e mee mu netamma, “Nu togesapa mu tuukwekwu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka seepu koodua natzakwona'adoo oe egeadu, oosoo kaaheno mu mabetseakwudu. Soo tooe haga tooe ka koodua-koobakwi oe tooe egeadu, tookwa gi toge manedu.
<range>
Soo tueya'edu ka umu mabetseadu sopedakwadoona, oosoo suu'mu oe natza'egeakwu. Soo seepu takonedu pummesoo seepu bihookakwu. Umu oo seepu yise, ka seepu koodua-wi'yoona kuowkase oo nagekakwu umu pumme takonedu tuapa nakasopedakwadoona.
<range>
Pana umu seepu ka kumma'akoosoo tuapa nakahoose umu sukwe namamea'akwu.”
Soo Te Pabe'e ka natugwenga makwuse, umu gi ka oo natugwengapu nakasopedakwadoo.
Soo Te Pabe'e yise meeoo tuwow, “Nu yow ka koodua natzakwona'a-wa'ne'yoo, sumuoosoo natzakwona'a-ga'yoo. Mu oo-toogoo oe egase nu ooosapa mu-kooba tueya'ekwu. Nu mu mabetseana, mu gi hemma namatuugekwu. Umu kukumma'a'yoosoo sumuna mooasoo nu-kobenasoo petugadu mee unnedu, ‘Nu mu magwetzoikwu.’ Umuoo esagoedu. Umuoo tuduhagetu-kwa'ne'yoosoo, umu nuka nagedu kadoo too'e mayugwedu. Mu e nanumu tooe kadoo mayugwekwudu. Pana umu nu-noyookwudu, gi ka mu numu nemooagadu nakatzabe-wa'ne'yoo. Nu yise yow petu, mu magwetzoikwutu, mu yise ooosapa gwetzoimona besa sokwamamokwu.
<range>
<range>
<range>
Nu yow ka mu mabetseakwuse, nu gi mu namanayahakwuna sookwa'e, nu ka mu-koobatoo nabatsakwuse, umu Te Naa naka'oedyukudu yise nu-no'yookwu. Soo E Naa besa e sooyugwe, nu ka oo tunetammapu mayohona mu numu magwetzoina, umu-koobatoo tuwazoo nabatsakwuse. Mu numu e batsakwu ka meeoo e soonamme, pana nu gi meeoo tusooyugwe. Nu pooha tumada'e, yise nu mesoo gwetzoa'ekwusoo, soo E Naa ka 'yoo e mane tuunguna. Nanakukumma'ayoosoo numu saa'a e naka'oedyukudooa. Nu yise sumusoo mu mayugwe petuse, mu mabetseana, mu-kooba tueya'edooa. Soo seepu takonedu gi mu seepu toge soobedya, ka puu gi mu hee-gana. O'no yise ka etza'a mu seepu-baa petuse, soo mu takonedu sukwe meahoo, oosoo ka gi mu seepu hee-soobedyana. Soo etza'a mu seepu-matu goehookwu, mu susumudu yise nana'emota petukwowkwu.”
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
Mu Jew numu ka oo nakase ka Te Pabe'e unnepu-witu, nanano sukwe nanepetukute.
Susumudu umu-matu mee unakwe, “Esoo nana tuma'emukwadu unu suta'a, gi oo nakabetseapana.”
Susumudu umu-matu punno'o mee unakwe, “Soo tuma'emukwadu, gi mee ooonnekoo yadooa-wa'ne'yoo, masoo unu nesoonamme. Esoo nana, Te Pabe'e gi tubootabuedu numu mabesakupu.”
Saa'a ka tu tommo petuse, mu Jew numu nanesootuhidu ewa tuka, umu ka oo soomayuna ka o'nosoo tu nanamooatupu ka Te Naa nanesootuhi nobe mu mabetsabepu.
Soo Te Pabe'e oona wunudyinnumme, ka nanesootuhi nobe-matoo nahabadoodu-tooha, ka Solomon haba mee naneadu-tooha'yoona mu numu nanesootuhiyakwe, umu-baa.
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu oo na'oonnakwi manise mee oo tubenga, “U haa'a ne nanekwegeakwu? U haa'a Ne Pabe'e?”
Soo Te Pabe'e mee mu nanekwege'a, “Nu mooasoo mu too'e tuukwe pana mu gi e naka'oedyukute. Nu ka E Naa nuka netamma-kwa'nesoo manakwe, mu sakwa uga e sopedakwatoo, pana mu gi e nakaheesoobedya.
Mu tookwa gi nu-no'yookwudu.
Umu nu-no'yoopunnedu e nakasopedakwadoo, yise e unnetoosoo mana'we. Nu mu sopedakwadoo,
mu yise ooosapa mu gwetzoimona petukudu. Gi haga nu oemota mu mayugwe-wa'ne'yoo.
Soo E Naa umu e doodooamu mayugwepu, soo E Naa ka mu numu ooonakwasoo pooha-gana, gi haga ka E Naa oemota mu nemayugwe-wa'ne'yoo.
Nu punno'o unu pooha-ga'yoo ka E Naa-wa'nekoosoo.”
Mu Jew numu tutunehanedu tupe tzobakooha, ka Te Pabe'e unnena gi naka petzabena oo tatzagahookwu mee sokwamana.
Soo Te Pabe'e mee mu netamma, “Ka E Naa nuka tunetammakuna nu mayohona ka mu numu tummatza'e, mu yise oowetoo e batsayagate.”
Umu mee ka Te Pabe'e netamma, “Pana numme u batsakwu ka Ne Naa-wa'nesoo u naneyugwe. Gi numme ka besa u tumadugu-kwitu u batsakwu. U sukwe numu, numme-wa'nesoo pana u mee unakwe, ‘Nu ka Te Naa-wa'ne'yoosoo.’ ”
Soo Te Pabe'e mee mu netamma, “Mu tookwa ka Te Naa unnepu ne'a, ka mee na'unnedu, ‘Soo Te Naa meeoo ka sukwe numu netamma, “Mu sakwa nu-kwa'ne'yoosoo.” ’
Soo Te Naa unnepu gi na'esayidu. Nu gi sukwe numu nu ka Te Naa tubetse yadooawabe. Ooonne'yoona mu sakwa gi e batsapana, tooe nu ka E Naa-wa'ne'yoo mee'e e unakwe sapa.
Soo Te Naa yaa teepu-koobatoo e taya. Ha'oo manena mu, ‘Esaya'e,’ mee e netamma, ‘Nu Te Naa Tooa'a,’ mee e unakwe?
